butterfly_registrator built with pdoc

butterfly_registrator.butterfly_registrator

User interface to manually register images and create alphascale images.

Intended to be run as a script:

$ python butterfly_registrator.py

Registration features:

Register images using four-point perspective transformation (homography). Zoom and pan for target and moving images with draggable control points. Preview of the registered image and the target reference image shown in a sliding overlay. Batch mode to register multiple images with the same resizing and homography (for example, XRF element maps).

Alphascale creation features:

Select color with a colorpicker and preview the result. Merge multiple alphascale images and preview the result.

Credits:

PyQt MDI Image Viewer by tpgit (http://tpgit.github.io/MDIImageViewer/) for image viewer panning and zooming.

  57class ResultView(SplitView):
  58    """Viewer to preview the result of registration.
  59
  60    Overrides SplitView by blocking right-click menu.
  61    
  62    See parent class for instantiation documentation.
  63    """
  64
  65    def __init__(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
  66            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth):
  67        super().__init__(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
  68            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth, allow_main_opacity=False)
  69        self.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose)
  70
  71        self._scene_main_topleft.disable_right_click = True

  74class CustomQGraphicsLineItem(QtWidgets.QGraphicsLineItem):
  75    """Overides QGraphicsLineItem to emit signal in scene that it has changed.
  76    
  77    See parent class for documentation.
  78    """
  79
  80    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  81        super().__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  82        self.travel_start = QtCore.QPointF()
  83        self.travel_end = QtCore.QPointF()
  84        self.undo_widget = None
  85        self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel = False
  86
  87    def itemChange(self, change, value):
  88        """"Extend to emit signal from scene that an item has changed."""
  89        if change == QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemScenePositionHasChanged:
  90            self.scene().position_changed_qgraphicsitem.emit()
  91        return super().itemChange(change, value)
  92    
  93    def mousePressEvent(self, event: QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent) -> None:
  94        """"Extend to record scene position at moment when mouse was pressed."""
  95        self.travel_start = self.scenePos()
  96        return super().mousePressEvent(event)
  97    
  98    def mouseReleaseEvent(self, event: QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent) -> None:
  99        """"Extend to record scene position at moment when mouse was released and emit a travel occurred."""
 100        self.travel_end = self.scenePos()
 101        self.tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made()
 102        return super().mouseReleaseEvent(event)
 103
 104    def set_position_manually(self, x, y):
 105        """"Set position manually with scene coordinates and record as a travel."""
 106        self.travel_start = self.scenePos()
 107        self.setPos(x, y)
 108        self.travel_end = self.scenePos()
 109        self.tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made()
 110
 111    def tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made(self):
 112        """"Set associated undo widget that a travel was made."""
 113        if self.undo_widget:
 114            self.undo_widget.set_as_undo()
 115            if not self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel:
 116                self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel = True
 117                self.undo_widget.setEnabled(True)
 118
 119    def undo_last_travel(self):
 120        """"Undo last recorded travel."""
 121        self.setPos(self.travel_start)
 122
 123    def redo_last_travel(self):
 124        """"Redo last recorded travel."""
 125        self.setPos(self.travel_end)
 126
 127    def set_undo_widget(self, widget=None):
 128        """"Set associated undo widget."""
 129        self.undo_widget = widget
 130

 133class RegisterView(SplitView):
 134    """Viewer with registration control points for target and moving images.
 135
 136    Extends SplitView by adding control points for four-point perspective transformation.
 137
 138    Overrides SplitView by blocking right-click menu.
 139    
 140    See parent class for instantiation documentation.
 141    """
 142
 143    registration_point_emitted = QtCore.pyqtSignal(QtCore.QPointF, int)
 144    registration_point_changed = QtCore.pyqtSignal()
 145
 146    def __init__(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
 147            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth):
 148
 149        super().__init__(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
 150            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth, allow_main_opacity=False)
 151        self.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose)
 152        
 153        self._scene_main_topleft.disable_right_click = True
 154
 155        self.registration_points = []
 156
 157        offset = 0.3
 158
 159        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=offset, placement_y=offset, text="1"))
 160        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=1-offset, placement_y=offset, text="2"))
 161        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=offset, placement_y=1-offset, text="3"))
 162        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=1-offset, placement_y=1-offset, text="4"))
 163
 164        i = -1
 165        for point in self.registration_points:
 166            i += 1
 167            self._scene_main_topleft.addItem(self.registration_points[i])
 168
 169        self._scene_main_topleft.position_changed_qgraphicsitem.connect(self.on_registration_point_moved)
 170
 171    def on_registration_point_moved(self):
 172        """Emit signals when control point is moved."""
 173        self.registration_point_changed.emit()
 174        self.emit_registration_points()
 175        return
 176
 177    def emit_registration_points(self):
 178        """Emit the position of all control points."""
 179        i = -1
 180        for point in self.registration_points:
 181            i += 1
 182            scene_pos = self.registration_points[i].scenePos()
 183            self.registration_point_emitted.emit(scene_pos, i)
 184
 185    def make_registration_point(self, placement_x, placement_y, text):
 186        """Create a control point.
 187        
 188        Args:
 189            placement_x (float): Horizontal position as a proportion of the image's width (0-1).
 190            placement_y (float): Vertical position as a proportion of the image's width (0-1).
 191            text (str): Text to show.
 192
 193        Returns:
 194            line_item_bounding_box (CustomQGraphicsLineItem): Control point as a QGraphicsItem.
 195        """
 196        width_pixmap_main_topleft = self._pixmapItem_main_topleft.pixmap().width()
 197        height_pixmap_main_topleft = self._pixmapItem_main_topleft.pixmap().height()
 198
 199        placement_x = placement_x
 200        placement_y = placement_y
 201
 202        pos_x = width_pixmap_main_topleft*placement_x
 203        pos_y = height_pixmap_main_topleft*placement_y
 204
 205        pos_on_scene = QtCore.QPointF(pos_x, pos_y)
 206
 207        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
 208        pen.setWidth(2)
 209        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white) # setColor also works
 210        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
 211        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
 212            
 213        brush = QtGui.QBrush()
 214        brush.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
 215        brush.setStyle(QtCore.Qt.SolidPattern)
 216
 217        width = 4
 218        height = 4
 219
 220        point_topleft = QtCore.QPointF(-width/2, -height/2)
 221        point_bottomright = QtCore.QPointF(width/2,height/2)
 222
 223        ellipse_rect = QtCore.QRectF(point_topleft, point_bottomright)
 224        ellipse_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsEllipseItem(ellipse_rect)
 225
 226        ellipse_item.setPos(0,0)
 227        
 228        ellipse_item.setBrush(brush)
 229        ellipse_item.setPen(pen)
 230
 231        ellipse_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations)
 232
 233        self.shadow = QtWidgets.QGraphicsDropShadowEffect(blurRadius=8, color=QtGui.QColor(0, 0, 0, 255), xOffset=0, yOffset=0)
 234
 235        dx = 30
 236        dy = -30
 237        point_p1 = QtCore.QPointF(0,0)
 238        point_p2 = QtCore.QPointF(dx,dy)
 239        line = QtCore.QLineF(point_p1, point_p2)
 240        line_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsLineItem(line)
 241        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
 242        pen.setWidth(2)
 243        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
 244        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
 245        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
 246        line_item.setPen(pen)
 247        line_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations)
 248        line_item.setPos(0,0)
 249        line_item.setGraphicsEffect(self.shadow)
 250
 251        line_item_bounding_box = CustomQGraphicsLineItem(line)
 252        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
 253        pen.setWidth(20)
 254        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.transparent)
 255        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
 256        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
 257        line_item_bounding_box.setPen(pen)
 258        line_item_bounding_box.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIsMovable | QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations | QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemSendsScenePositionChanges)
 259        line_item_bounding_box.set_position_manually(pos_on_scene.x(),pos_on_scene.y())
 260
 261        text_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsTextItem(text)
 262        font = text_item.font()
 263        font.setPointSize(14)
 264        text_item.setFont(font)
 265        text_item.setPos(dx+1,dy-18)
 266        text_item.setDefaultTextColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
 267        text_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations) # QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIsSelectable
 268
 269        text_item.setParentItem(line_item)
 270        ellipse_item.setParentItem(line_item)
 271        line_item.setParentItem(line_item_bounding_box)
 272
 273        return line_item_bounding_box
 274    
 275    def set_point(self, which_point: int, x_or_y: str, value: float):
 276        """"Set position of control point coordinate in scene.
 277        
 278        Args:
 279            which_point (int): Index of control point to set (1, 2, 3, or 4).
 280            x_or_y (str): String of coordinate ("x" or "y").
 281            value (float): Value of coordinate in scene.
 282        """
 283        
 284        if which_point < 1 or which_point > 4:
 285            return
 286        
 287        i = which_point - 1
 288        scene_pos = self.registration_points[i]
 289
 290        if x_or_y == "x":
 291            x = value
 292            y = scene_pos.y()
 293        elif x_or_y == "y":
 294            x = scene_pos.x()
 295            y = value
 296        else:
 297            return
 298        
 299        self.registration_points[i].set_position_manually(x, y)
 300
 301    def set_points(self, pairs: list=None):
 302        """Set position of all control points on scene with x,y pairs.
 303        
 304        Args:
 305            pairs (list): Position x,y pairs of control points ([[x1,y1],[x2,y2],[x3,y3],[x4,y4]]).
 306        """
 307        if len(pairs) != 4:
 308            return
 309        for i, pair in enumerate(pairs):
 310            self.registration_points[i].set_position_manually(pair[0], pair[1])
 311

 314class DragAndDropWidget(QtWidgets.QWidget):
 315    """Drag-and-drop widget for single image files to emit their filepaths.
 316    
 317    Instantiate without input.
 318    """ 
 319
 320    file_path_dragged_and_dropped = QtCore.pyqtSignal(str)    
 321
 322    def __init__(self):
 323        super().__init__()
 324
 325        self.image_filetypes = [
 326            ".jpeg", ".jpg", ".jpe", ".jif", ".jfif", ".jfi", ".pjpeg", ".pjp",
 327            ".png",
 328            ".tiff", ".tif",
 329            ".bmp",
 330            ".webp",
 331            ".ico", ".cur"]
 332
 333        self.setAcceptDrops(True)
 334
 335    def dragEnterEvent(self, event):
 336        """event: Override dragEnterEvent() to accept a single image file."""
 337        if len(event.mimeData().urls()) is 1 and self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData()):
 338            event.accept()
 339        else:
 340            event.ignore()
 341
 342    def dragMoveEvent(self, event):
 343        """event: Override dragMoveEvent() to accept a single image file."""
 344        if len(event.mimeData().urls()) is 1 and self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData()):
 345            event.accept()
 346        else:
 347            event.ignore()
 348
 349    def dropEvent(self, event):
 350        """event: Override dropEvent() to accept a single image file."""
 351        urls = self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData())
 352
 353        if len(urls) is 1 and urls:
 354            event.setDropAction(QtCore.Qt.CopyAction)
 355            file_path = urls[0].toLocalFile()
 356            self.file_path_dragged_and_dropped.emit(file_path)
 357            event.accept()
 358        else:
 359            event.ignore()
 360
 361    def grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(self, mimedata):
 362        """mimeData: Get urls (filepaths) from drop event."""
 363        urls = list()
 364        for url in mimedata.urls():
 365            if any([filetype in url.toLocalFile().lower() for filetype in self.image_filetypes]):
 366                urls.append(url)
 367        return urls

 371class Registrator(QtWidgets.QWidget):
 372    """Interface to register a moving image to a target image by setting control points in viewers of each.
 373
 374    Instantiate without input.
 375
 376    Registration is based on four-point perspective transformation where the control points are manually dragged.
 377    
 378    Interface sequence: 
 379        Load the target image by drag-and-drop or open dialog. 
 380        Load the moving image by drag-and-drop or open dialog.
 381        Set the control points on each image by click-and-drag. 
 382        Preview the registered image and compare with the target image in a split-view. 
 383        Adjust and re-compare the control points, if needed.
 384        Save the registered image.
 385        (Optional) Batch-register multiple images with the current registration, if needed.
 386    """
 387    
 388    loading = QtCore.pyqtSignal(bool)
 389
 390    def __init__(self):
 391        super().__init__()
 392
 393        self.n_registration_points = 4
 394        self.registration_point_changed_but_not_applied = True
 395        self.fullpath_reference = None
 396        self.fullpath_toregister = None
 397
 398        # Build 'reference' image
 399        self.reference_layout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout()
 400        self.reference_layout.setContentsMargins(0,0,0,0)
 401
 402        reference_title_label = QtWidgets.QLabel("Reference (target)")
 403        reference_title_label.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Maximum)
 404
 405        reference_drag_widget = DragAndDropWidget()
 406        reference_drag_widget.file_path_dragged_and_dropped.connect(self.dragged_and_dropped_reference)
 407
 408        reference_drag_label = QtWidgets.QLabel("Step 1:\n\nDrag or select reference image")
 409        reference_drag_label.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignCenter | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 410        reference_drag_label.setStyleSheet("""
 411            QLabel {
 412                font-size: 10pt;
 413                border: 0.15em dashed gray;
 414                border-radius: 0.3em;
 415                background-color: transparent;
 416                padding: 1.2em;
 417                } 
 418            """)
 419        reference_drag_label.setWordWrap(True)
 420        reference_drag_label.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.WA_TransparentForMouseEvents)
 421
 422        self.select_reference_button = DragZoneButton(margin=16)
 423        self.select_reference_button.setText("Select image...")
 424        self.select_reference_button.clicked.connect(self.select_via_dialog_reference)
 425
 426        self.reference_info_button = InfoButton(margin=0)
 427        self.reference_info_button.set_box_title("Target image")
 428        self.reference_info_button.set_box_text("The reference image is the 'target' to which the 'moving' image will be registered. It can be considered the 'ground truth' for registration. \n\nFor example, a target image 900×900px will cause a moving image 400×300px to increase to 900×900px.")
 429
 430        val = 0.0
 431        val_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(val)
 432
 433        reference_point_label_x = QtWidgets.QLabel("x (px)")
 434        reference_point_label_x.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 435        reference_point_label_x.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignRight | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 436        reference_point_label_y = QtWidgets.QLabel("y (px)")
 437        reference_point_label_y.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 438        reference_point_label_y.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignRight | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 439
 440        reference_point_label_name1 = QtWidgets.QLabel(" 1 ")
 441        reference_point_label_name1.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 442        reference_point_label_name1.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignRight | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 443
 444        self.reference_point_label_x1 = NumberLineEdit(1, "x", val_str)
 445        self.reference_point_label_y1 = NumberLineEdit(1, "y", val_str)
 446 
 447        reference_point_label_name2 = QtWidgets.QLabel(" 2 ")
 448        reference_point_label_name2.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 449        reference_point_label_name2.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignRight | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 450        self.reference_point_label_x2 = NumberLineEdit(2, "x", val_str)
 451        self.reference_point_label_y2 = NumberLineEdit(2, "y", val_str)
 452 
 453        reference_point_label_name3 = QtWidgets.QLabel(" 3 ")
 454        reference_point_label_name3.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 455        reference_point_label_name3.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignRight | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 456        self.reference_point_label_x3 = NumberLineEdit(3, "x", val_str)
 457        self.reference_point_label_y3 = NumberLineEdit(3, "y", val_str)

 518

 520        reference_splitter_layout.setContentsMargins(0,0,0,0)

 523        reference_splitter_layout.addWidget(self.reference_info_button, 0, 0, QtCore.Qt.AlignTop|QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)

 527        # Build 'to register' (image to be registered)

 811    def set_hidden_apply_popup(self, boolean):
 812        """bool: Hide reminder to click 'Apply' when control point(s) moved (convenience)."""
 813        self.result_apply_popup_is_hidden = boolean
 814        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()

 816    def on_registration_point_emitted_reference(self, pos_on_scene, index):
 817        """Update the displayed coordinates of a given target control point.
 818        
 819        Triggered when a control point is moved on the reference image.
 820        
 821        Args:
 822            pos_on_scene (QPointF): The position on the scene of the control point.
 823            index (int): The index of the control point (which control point it is).
 824        """
 825        x = pos_on_scene.x()
 826        y = pos_on_scene.y()
 827        i = index + 1
 828
 829        x_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(x)
 830        y_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(y)
 831
 832        if i is 1:
 833            self.reference_point_label_x1.setText(x_str)
 834            self.reference_point_label_x1.value = x
 835            self.reference_point_label_y1.setText(y_str)
 836            self.reference_point_label_y1.value = y
 837        elif i is 2:
 838            self.reference_point_label_x2.setText(x_str)
 839            self.reference_point_label_x2.value = x
 840            self.reference_point_label_y2.setText(y_str)
 841            self.reference_point_label_y2.value = y
 842        elif i is 3:
 843            self.reference_point_label_x3.setText(x_str)
 844            self.reference_point_label_x3.value = x
 845            self.reference_point_label_y3.setText(y_str)
 846            self.reference_point_label_y3.value = y
 847        elif i is 4:
 848            self.reference_point_label_x4.setText(x_str)
 849            self.reference_point_label_x4.value = x
 850            self.reference_point_label_y4.setText(y_str)
 851            self.reference_point_label_y4.value = y
 852
 853        self.points_reference[i-1][0] = x
 854        self.points_reference[i-1][1] = y
 855
 856    def on_registration_point_emitted_toregister(self, pos_on_scene, index):
 857        """Update the displayed coordinates of a given moving control point.
 858        
 859        Triggered when a control point is moved on the to-be-registered image.
 860        
 861        Args:
 862            pos_on_scene (QPointF): The position on the scene of the control point.
 863            index (int): The index of the control point (which control point it is).
 864        """
 865        x = pos_on_scene.x()
 866        y = pos_on_scene.y()
 867        i = index + 1
 868
 869        x_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(x)
 870        y_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(y)
 871
 872        if i is 1:
 873            self.toregister_point_label_x1.setText(x_str)
 874            self.toregister_point_label_x1.value = x
 875            self.toregister_point_label_y1.setText(y_str)
 876            self.toregister_point_label_y1.value = y
 877        elif i is 2:
 878            self.toregister_point_label_x2.setText(x_str)
 879            self.toregister_point_label_x2.value = x
 880            self.toregister_point_label_y2.setText(y_str)
 881            self.toregister_point_label_y2.value = y
 882        elif i is 3:
 883            self.toregister_point_label_x3.setText(x_str)
 884            self.toregister_point_label_x3.value = x
 885            self.toregister_point_label_y3.setText(y_str)
 886            self.toregister_point_label_y3.value = y
 887        elif i is 4:
 888            self.toregister_point_label_x4.setText(x_str)
 889            self.toregister_point_label_x4.value = x
 890            self.toregister_point_label_y4.setText(y_str)
 891            self.toregister_point_label_y4.value = y
 892
 893        self.points_toregister[i-1][0] = x
 894        self.points_toregister[i-1][1] = y
 895
 896    def on_registration_point_changed(self):
 897        """Record that a registration point has changed on either image."""
 898        self.registration_point_changed_but_not_applied = True
 899        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
 900        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
 901        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()
 902
 903    def load_reference(self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None):
 904        """Load an image as the target image.
 905        
 906        Args:
 907            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the reference image.
 908            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 909            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 910            filename_bottomright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 911        """
 912        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Loading reference image...")
 913
 914        self.fullpath_reference = filename_main_topleft
 915        
 916        self.pixmap_reference = QtGui.QPixmap(self.fullpath_reference)
 917        pixmap_topright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_topright)
 918        pixmap_bottomleft = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomleft)
 919        pixmap_bottomright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomright)
 920
 921        angle = get_exif_rotation_angle(self.fullpath_reference)
 922        if angle:
 923            self.pixmap_reference = self.pixmap_reference.transformed(QtGui.QTransform().rotate(angle))
 924
 925        self.viewer_reference = self.create_viewer_reference(self.pixmap_reference, self.fullpath_reference, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
 926        self.reference_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_reference, 1, 0)
 927        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_reference.fitToWindow)
 928        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_reference.emit_registration_points)
 929
 930        # Registration
 931        self.image_reference_width = self.pixmap_reference.width()
 932        self.image_reference_height = self.pixmap_reference.height()
 933        self.viewer_reference.registration_point_emitted.connect(self.on_registration_point_emitted_reference)
 934        self.set_enabled_toregister(True)
 935
 936        # Line edits
 937        self.reference_point_label_x1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 938        self.reference_point_label_y1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 939        self.reference_point_label_x2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 940        self.reference_point_label_y2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 941        self.reference_point_label_x3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 942        self.reference_point_label_y3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 943        self.reference_point_label_x4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 944        self.reference_point_label_y4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 945
 946        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
 947
 948    def create_viewer_reference(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
 949        """Create a viewer for the target image.
 950
 951        Args:
 952            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The target image pixmap.
 953            filename_main_topleft (str): The target image filename.
 954            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 955            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 956            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 957
 958        Returns:
 959            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
 960        """
 961        name = "Reference"
 962        transform_mode_smooth = False
 963        viewer = RegisterView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth)
 964
 965        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(filename_main_topleft)
 966        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
 967
 968        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_reference)
 969        viewer.registration_point_changed.connect(self.on_registration_point_changed)
 970
 971        for button, point in zip(self.reference_point_undo_buttons, viewer.registration_points):
 972            button.set_control_point_widget(point)
 973            point.set_undo_widget(button)
 974
 975        return viewer

 977    def close_viewer_reference(self):
 978        """Close the target image viewer."""
 979
 980        box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
 981        title = "Close and reset control points?"
 982
 983        if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
 984            text = "Closing the reference image will also close the moving image and reset all control points."
 985        else:
 986            text = "Closing the reference image will reset its control points."
 987        
 988        box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
 989        box.addButton("Close and reset", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
 990        box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
 991        response = box.exec_()
 992
 993        if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
 994            return
 995
 996        if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
 997        
 998            if self.viewer_reference:
 999                self.viewer_reference.close()
1000                self.viewer_reference.deleteLater()
1001                del self.pixmap_reference
1002                if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1003                    self.close_viewer_toregister(bypass_message=True)
1004                self.set_enabled_toregister(False)
1005                for button in self.reference_point_undo_buttons:
1006                    button.set_control_point_widget(None)

1031    # "To register" functions for the image which is to be registered to the reference image
1032    def load_toregister(self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None):
1033        """Load an image as the moving image.
1034
1035        Resizes and pads the moving image to match the dimensions of the target image.
1036        
1037        Args:
1038            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the to-be-registered image.
1039            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1040            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1041            filename_bottomright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1042        """
1043        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Loading image to be registered...")
1044
1045        self.fullpath_toregister = filename_main_topleft
1046
1047        # Load image
1048        if self.fullpath_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1049            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1050            if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1051                self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister) 
1052        else:
1053            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister)
1054        self.image_toregister = self.image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1055        self.image_toregister_dims = self.image_toregister.shape
1056        self.image_toregister_height = self.image_toregister_dims[0]
1057        self.image_toregister_width = self.image_toregister_dims[1]
1058
1059        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1060        aspect_toregister = self.image_toregister_width/self.image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1061
1062        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1063            self.image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1064            self.image_toregister_resize_height = int(self.image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1065        else: # If the toregister is narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1066            self.image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1067            self.image_toregister_resize_width = int(self.image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1068            
1069        self.image_toregister_resize_dims = (self.image_toregister_resize_width, self.image_toregister_resize_height)
1070        self.image_toregister_resize = resize(self.image_toregister, self.image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1071
1072        # Pad
1073        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1074        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1075        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - self.image_toregister_resize_height
1076        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - self.image_toregister_resize_width
1077        if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1078            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1079        else:
1080            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1081
1082        self.image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1083        self.image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1084
1085        # Convert cvImage to QPixmap
1086        height, width, channels = self.image_toregister_resize.shape
1087        
1088        total_bytes = self.image_toregister_resize.nbytes
1089        bytes_per_line = int(total_bytes/height)
1090        # bytes_per_line = width*3
1091        if channels is 4:
1092            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGBA8888).rgbSwapped()
1093        else:
1094            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped()
1095
1096        self.pixmap_toregister_resize = QtGui.QPixmap(qimage)
1097        pixmap_topright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_topright)
1098        pixmap_bottomleft = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomleft)
1099        pixmap_bottomright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomright)
1100
1101        self.viewer_toregister = self.create_viewer_toregister(self.pixmap_toregister_resize, self.fullpath_toregister, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
1102        self.toregister_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_toregister, 1, 0)
1103        
1104        self.viewer_toregister.zoomFactor = self.viewer_reference.zoomFactor
1105        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.centerView)
1106        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points)
1107        
1108        self.viewer_toregister.registration_point_emitted.connect(self.on_registration_point_emitted_toregister)
1109
1110        self.set_enabled_result(True)
1111        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
1112        self.result_batch_widget.setEnabled(True)
1113
1114        self.viewer_toregister_isclosed = False
1115
1116        self.viewer_reference.emit_registration_points()
1117        self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points()
1118
1119        # Line edits
1120        self.toregister_point_label_x1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1121        self.toregister_point_label_y1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1122        self.toregister_point_label_x2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1123        self.toregister_point_label_y2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1124        self.toregister_point_label_x3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1125        self.toregister_point_label_y3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1126        self.toregister_point_label_x4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1127        self.toregister_point_label_y4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1128
1129        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1130
1131    def create_viewer_toregister(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
1132        """Create a viewer for the moving image.
1133
1134        Args:
1135            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The moving image pixmap.
1136            filename_main_topleft (str): The moving image filename.
1137            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1138            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1139            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1140
1141        Returns:
1142            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
1143        """
1144        name = "To be registered"
1145        transform_mode_smooth = False
1146        viewer = RegisterView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth)
1147
1148        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(filename_main_topleft)
1149        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1150
1151        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_toregister)
1152        viewer.registration_point_changed.connect(self.on_registration_point_changed)
1153
1154        for button, point in zip(self.toregister_point_undo_buttons, viewer.registration_points):
1155            button.set_control_point_widget(point)
1156            point.set_undo_widget(button)
1157
1158        return viewer

1160    def close_viewer_toregister(self, bypass_message=False):
1161        """Close the moving image viewer."""
1162
1163        response = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole
1164
1165        if not bypass_message:
1166            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1167            title = "Close and reset control points?"
1168            text = "Closing the moving image will reset its control points."
1169            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1170            box.addButton("Close and reset", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1171            box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1172            response = box.exec_()
1173
1174            if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1175                return
1176
1177        if bypass_message or (response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole):
1178
1179            if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1180
1181                self.viewer_toregister.close()
1182                self.viewer_toregister.deleteLater()
1183                del self.pixmap_toregister_resize
1184                self.image_toregister = None
1185                self.viewer_toregister_isclosed = True
1186
1187                for button in self.toregister_point_undo_buttons:
1188                    button.set_control_point_widget(None)
1189
1190                self.result_widget.setEnabled(False)
1191
1192                if not self.viewer_result_isclosed:
1193                    self.close_viewer_result()
1194
1195                self.set_enabled_result(False)
1196                self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(False)
1197                self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1198                self.result_batch_widget.setEnabled(False)
1199                self.filepaths_batch = None
1200                self.folderpath_batch = None
1201                self.result_batch_checkbox.setChecked(False)
1202                self.result_batch_folder_button.setEnabled(False)
1203                self.result_batch_save_button.setEnabled(False)

1229    # Result
1230    def register_and_load_result(self):
1231        """Register the moving image and load the preview in a split-view with the target image."""
1232        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(False)
1233        self.registration_point_changed_but_not_applied = False
1234
1235        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Registering and loading preview...")
1236        
1237        self.register_result()
1238        self.load_result()       
1239        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(True)
1240                
1241        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

1243    def register_result(self):
1244        """Register the moving image."""
1245        points_source = self.points_toregister
1246        points_destination = self.points_reference
1247
1248        image = self.image_toregister_resize
1249        width = self.image_toregister_resize_width
1250        height = self.image_toregister_resize_height
1251        size = (width, height)
1252
1253        transform = getPerspectiveTransform(points_source, points_destination)
1254
1255        self.image_registered = warpPerspective(image, transform, size)
1256
1257        # Convert cvImage to QPixmap
1258        height, width, channels = self.image_registered.shape
1259        total_bytes = self.image_registered.nbytes
1260        bytes_per_line = int(total_bytes/height)
1261        if channels is 4:
1262            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_registered.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGBA8888).rgbSwapped()
1263        else:
1264            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_registered.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped()
1265
1266        self.pixmap_registered = QtGui.QPixmap(qimage)
1267
1268    def load_result(self):
1269        """Load the registered image into a viewer."""
1270        if not self.viewer_result_isclosed:
1271            self.viewer_result.close()
1272            self.viewer_result.deleteLater()
1273
1274        self.filename_result_reference = self.fullpath_reference
1275        self.filename_result_registered = self.fullpath_toregister
1276        
1277        # Split view left=reference, right=registered
1278        pixmap = self.pixmap_reference
1279        pixmap_topright = self.pixmap_registered
1280        pixmap_bottomright = self.pixmap_registered
1281        pixmap_bottomleft = self.pixmap_registered
1282
1283        self.viewer_result = self.create_viewer_result(pixmap, self.filename_result_reference, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
1284        self.result_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_result, 1, 0, 1, 3)
1285        
1286        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_result.fitToWindow)
1287
1288        self.viewer_result_isclosed = False
1289        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()
1290
1291    def create_viewer_result(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
1292        """Create a viewer for the registered moving image.
1293
1294        Args:
1295            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The registered image pixmap.
1296            filename_main_topleft (str): The registered image filename.
1297            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1298            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1299            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1300
1301        Returns:
1302            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
1303        """
1304        name = "Result"
1305        viewer = ResultView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name,
1306            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth=False)
1307        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(self.filename_result_reference)
1308        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1309        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1310        viewer.label_bottomleft.setText(self.filename_result_registered.replace('.', suffix))
1311        viewer.label_bottomleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1312        opacity_topright = 33
1313        opacity_bottomright = 66
1314        viewer.set_opacity_topright(opacity_topright)
1315        viewer.set_opacity_bottomright(opacity_bottomright)
1316        viewer.label_topright.setText(f"Registered {opacity_topright}% overlayed")
1317        viewer.label_topright.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1318        viewer.label_bottomright.setText(f"Registered {opacity_bottomright}% overlayed")
1319        viewer.label_bottomright.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1320
1321        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_result)
1322
1323        return viewer

1325    def close_viewer_result(self):
1326        """Close the registered image viewer."""
1327        if not self.viewer_result_isclosed:
1328            self.viewer_result.close()
1329            self.viewer_result.deleteLater()
1330            del self.pixmap_registered
1331            self.image_registered = None
1332            self.viewer_result_isclosed = True
1333            self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
1334        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1335        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()

1337    def save_result(self):
1338        """Open a save dialog window to save the registered image to file."""
1339        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Saving registered image...")
1340
1341        fullpath_initial = self.fullpath_toregister
1342        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1343        fullpath_initial = fullpath_initial.replace('.', suffix)
1344
1345        name_filters = "JPEG (*.jpeg);; JPG (*.jpg);; PNG (*.png);; TIFF (*.tiff);; TIF (*.tif);; BMP (*.bmp)"
1346
1347        selected_filter = None
1348
1349        if fullpath_initial.endswith('.jpeg'):
1350            selected_filter = "JPEG (*.jpeg)"
1351        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.jpg'):
1352            selected_filter = "JPG (*.jpg)"
1353        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.png'):
1354            selected_filter = "PNG (*.png)"
1355        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.tiff'):
1356            selected_filter = "TIFF (*.tiff)"
1357        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.tif'):
1358            selected_filter = "TIF (*.tif)"
1359        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.bmp'):
1360            selected_filter = "BMP (*.bmp)"
1361
1362        fullpath_selected, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self, "Save registered image", fullpath_initial, name_filters, selected_filter)
1363
1364        if fullpath_selected:
1365            self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Saving registered image '" + fullpath_selected.split("/")[-1] + "'...")
1366            if fullpath_selected.endswith('.jpg') or fullpath_selected.endswith('.jpeg'):
1367                imwrite(fullpath_selected, self.image_registered, [int(IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), 100])
1368            else:
1369                imwrite(fullpath_selected, self.image_registered)
1370
1371            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1372            title = "Auto-save control points?"
1373            text = "Do you also want to save the control points?"
1374            text += "\n\nThis will automatically save them to .csv control point file in the same directory as the registered image. You can then later load and redo the registration if needed."
1375            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1376            box.addButton("Auto-save control points", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1377            box.addButton("Skip", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1378            response = box.exec_()
1379
1380            if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1381
1382                directory_csv = os.path.dirname(fullpath_selected)
1383                directory_csv = directory_csv + "\\"
1384                filename_csv = self.generate_points_filename()
1385                fullpath_csv = directory_csv + filename_csv
1386
1387                filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1388                filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1389
1390                points_reference = self.points_reference 
1391                points_toregister = self.points_toregister
1392
1393                self.save_points(fullpath_csv,
1394                                filename_reference, points_reference, 
1395                                [filename_toregister], points_toregister)
1396
1397        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1398

1421    def select_batch_folder(self):
1422        """Open an open dialog window to select a destination folder to which to save the batch-registered file(s)."""
1423        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Selecting folder to save batch registered image(s)...")
1424
1425        filepath = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getExistingDirectory(self, "Select folder")
1426
1427        if filepath:
1428            self.folderpath_batch = filepath
1429            self.result_batch_save_button.setEnabled(True)
1430        else:
1431            self.result_batch_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1432
1433        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

1435    def save_batch(self):
1436        """Register and save the selected batch files to the selected destination folder."""
1437        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Registering and saving batch image(s)...")
1438
1439        one_or_more_images_mismatch = False
1440
1441        fullpaths = self.filepaths_batch
1442        folderpath = self.folderpath_batch
1443
1444        one_or_more_already_exists = False
1445
1446        for fullpath in fullpaths:
1447            fullpath_intended = self.generate_registered_fullpath(folderpath, fullpath)[0]
1448            if os.path.isfile(fullpath_intended):
1449                one_or_more_already_exists = True
1450
1451        if one_or_more_already_exists:
1452            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1453            title = "Overwrite already registered files?"
1454            text = "One or more of the images you selected already exist as registered images in the selected destination folder."
1455            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1456            box.addButton("Overwrite and proceed", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1457            box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1458            response = box.exec_()
1459
1460            if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1461                self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1462                return
1463        
1464        fullpaths_successful = []
1465
1466        for i, fullpath in enumerate(fullpaths):
1467
1468            text = "Registering batch image '" + fullpath.split("/")[-1] + "' (" + str(i+1) + "/" + str(len(fullpaths)) + ")..."
1469            self.display_loading_grayout(True, text)
1470
1471            image_registered = self.read_resize_pad_register(fullpath)
1472
1473            if image_registered is not False:
1474                
1475                fullpath_registered, filename_registered = self.generate_registered_fullpath(folderpath, fullpath)
1476
1477                text = "Saving batch image '" + filename_registered + "' (" + str(i+1) + "/" + str(len(fullpaths)) + ")..."
1478                self.display_loading_grayout(True, text)
1479                
1480                if fullpath_registered.endswith('.jpg') or fullpath_registered.endswith('.jpeg'):
1481                    imwrite(fullpath_registered, image_registered, [int(IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), 100])
1482                else:
1483                    imwrite(fullpath_registered, image_registered)
1484
1485                fullpaths_successful.append(fullpath)
1486            else:
1487                one_or_more_images_mismatch = True
1488
1489            QtWidgets.QApplication.processEvents()
1490
1491        box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information
1492        title = "Batch complete"
1493        text = "Batch registration and saving is complete."
1494        box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1495        box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1496        box.exec_()
1497
1498        if one_or_more_images_mismatch:
1499            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1500            title = "One or more unsuccessful registrations"
1501            text = "One or more images selected in the batch were not registered. Their height and width do not match those of the moving image where the control points are set."
1502            box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1503            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1504            box.exec_()
1505
1506        if len(fullpaths_successful) > 0:
1507            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1508            title = "Auto-save control points?"
1509            text = "Do you also want to save the control points?"
1510            text += "\n\nThis will auto-save them to .csv in the same directory as the registered images, allowing you to load and redo the registration if needed."
1511            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1512            box.addButton("Auto-save control points", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1513            box.addButton("Skip", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1514            response = box.exec_()
1515
1516            if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1517
1518                directory_csv = folderpath
1519                directory_csv = directory_csv + "\\"
1520                filename_csv = self.generate_points_filename(batch=True)
1521                fullpath_csv = directory_csv + filename_csv
1522
1523                filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1524                filenames_toregister = []
1525                for fullpath in fullpaths_successful:
1526                    filenames_toregister.append(os.path.basename(fullpath))
1527
1528                points_reference = self.points_reference 
1529                points_toregister = self.points_toregister
1530
1531                self.save_points(fullpath_csv,
1532                                filename_reference, points_reference, 
1533                                filenames_toregister, points_toregister)
1534
1535        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1536
1537    def on_click_save_points(self):
1538        """Opens dialog to specify filename where to save control points of target and moving images."""
1539        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Saving control points...")
1540
1541        if self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1542            return
1543
1544        filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1545        filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1546        points_reference = self.points_reference 
1547        points_toregister = self.points_toregister
1548
1549        directory_default = None
1550

1552            directory_default = os.path.dirname(self.fullpath_toregister)
1553            directory_default = directory_default + "\\"
1554        else:
1555            self.display_loading_grayout(False, pseudo_load_time=0)
1556            return

1559        name_filters = "CSV (*.csv)" # Allows users to select filetype of screenshot

1562

1565                             filename_reference, points_reference, 
1566                             [filename_toregister], points_toregister)

1570    def generate_points_filename(self, batch: bool=False):
1571        """str: Returns default filename for control points .csv."""
1572        filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1573        filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1574
1575        date_and_time = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H%M%S') # Sets the default filename with date and time 
1576
1577        if batch:
1578            filename_toregister = "Batch"
1579
1580        filename_csv = "Registration points" + " - " + filename_toregister.split('.')[0] + " to " + filename_reference.split('.')[0] + " - " + date_and_time + ".csv"
1581
1582        return filename_csv
1583    
1584    def generate_registered_fullpath(self, folderpath: str=None, fullpath_toregister: str=None):
1585        """str: Returns default fullpath and filename for an image to be registered given a destination folder."""
1586        fullpath_registered = None
1587        filename_registered = fullpath_toregister.split("/")[-1]
1588        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1589        filename_registered = filename_registered.replace('.', suffix)
1590        if folderpath:
1591            fullpath_registered = folderpath + "/" + filename_registered
1592
1593        return fullpath_registered, filename_registered

1596    def on_click_load_points(self):
1597        """Opens dialog to open .csv file of control points."""
1598        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Selecting .csv file to load control points...")
1599
1600        if self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1601            return
1602        
1603        directory_default = None
1604
1605        if self.fullpath_toregister:
1606            directory_default = os.path.dirname(self.fullpath_toregister)
1607            directory_default = directory_default + "\\"
1608        else:
1609            self.display_loading_grayout(False, pseudo_load_time=0)
1610            return
1611        
1612        fullpath, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, "Select control point file (.csv) to load", directory_default, "Comma-Separated Value File (*.csv)")
1613

1615        filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1616        
1617        points_reference, points_toregister = self.load_points(fullpath, filename_reference, filename_toregister)
1618
1619        self.set_points(points_reference, points_toregister)
1620
1621        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

1623    def load_points(self,
1624                    fullpath: str=None,
1625                    filename_reference: str=None,
1626                    filename_toregister: str=None):
1627        """Get control points from .csv to target and moving images.
1628
1629        Checks whether current target image and moving image are those in the .csv file.
1630
1631        Args:
1632            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv of control points to be loaded.
1633            filename_reference (str): Filename of current target image.
1634            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename of current moving image.
1635
1636        Returns:
1637            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1638            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1639        """
1640        
1641        points_reference = []
1642        points_toregister = []
1643
1644        if fullpath:
1645
1646            with open(fullpath, "r", newline='') as csv_file:
1647                csv_reader = csv.reader(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1648                csv_list = list(csv_reader)
1649
1650            i = None
1651
1652            try:
1653                i = csv_list.index(["target"])
1654            except ValueError:
1655                box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1656                title = "Invalid .csv control point file"
1657                text = "The selected .csv control point file does not have a format accepted by this app."
1658                box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1659                box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1660                box.exec_()
1661            else:
1662                skip_reference = False
1663                skip_toregister = False
1664
1665                i += 1 # Move to target filename
1666                if not csv_list[i][0] == filename_reference:
1667                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1668                    title = "Filename mismatch target image"
1669                    text = "The filename of the reference image (the target image) does not match the target filename in the control point file."
1670                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1671                    box.addButton("Load reference points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1672                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1673                    response = box.exec_()
1674                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1675                        skip_reference = True
1676
1677                i += 2 # Move to moving filename
1678                try:
1679                    csv_list[i].index(filename_toregister)
1680                except ValueError:
1681                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1682                    title = "Filename mismatch moving image"
1683                    text = "The filename of the to-be-registered image (the moving image) does not match any moving filenames in the control point file."
1684                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1685                    box.addButton("Load moving points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1686                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1687                    response = box.exec_()
1688                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1689                        skip_toregister = True
1690
1691                i += 2 # Move to XY pairs
1692                point = -1
1693                for row in csv_list[i:]:
1694                    point += 1
1695                    if not skip_reference:
1696                        points_reference.append([float(row[0]), float(row[1])])
1697                        if not skip_toregister:
1698                            points_toregister.append([float(row[2]), float(row[3])])
1699
1700        return points_reference, points_toregister           
1701        
1702    def set_points(self,
1703                    points_reference,
1704                    points_toregister):
1705        """Set positions of control points for reference and to-register images.
1706        
1707        Args:
1708            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ].
1709            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ].
1710        """
1711        self.viewer_reference.set_points(points_reference)
1712        self.viewer_toregister.set_points(points_toregister)
1713
1714    def save_points(self, 
1715                    fullpath: str=None,
1716                    filename_reference: str=None, points_reference: list=None, 
1717                    filename_toregister: list=None, points_toregister: list=None):
1718        """Save the control points of the target image and moving image to a .csv with a given filepath.
1719        
1720        Args:
1721            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv to be saved.
1722            filename_reference (str): Filename of target image. Can be produced with os.path.basename(fullpath. Example: "image.jpg".
1723            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format: [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1724            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename(s) of moving image(s).
1725            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image.
1726        """
1727        # Check if all inputs exist
1728        if filename_reference is None:
1729            return 
1730        elif points_reference is None:
1731            return
1732        elif filename_toregister is None:
1733            return
1734        elif points_toregister is None:
1735            return
1736        elif len(points_reference) != len(points_toregister):
1737            return
1738        
1739        x_reference = []
1740        y_reference = []
1741        x_toregister = []
1742        y_toregister = []
1743        
1744        header = [["Butterfly Registrator"],
1745                  [__version__],
1746                  ["control points"],
1747                  ["Assumes moving image(s) resized and padded to match target image dimensions"],
1748                  ["target"],
1749                  [filename_reference],
1750                  ["moving"],
1751                  filename_toregister,
1752                  ["x", "y", "x", "y"]]
1753        
1754        for point_reference, point_toregister in zip(points_reference, points_toregister):
1755            x_reference.append(point_reference[0])
1756            y_reference.append(point_reference[1])
1757            x_toregister.append(point_toregister[0])
1758            y_toregister.append(point_toregister[1])
1759
1760
1761        with open(fullpath, "w", newline='') as csv_file:
1762            csv_writer = csv.writer(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1763            for row in header:
1764                csv_writer.writerow(row)
1765            for row in zip(x_reference, y_reference, x_toregister, y_toregister):
1766                csv_writer.writerow(row)
1767
1768    def read_resize_pad_register(self, filename):
1769        """Read, resize, and register an image file with the last applied homography.
1770        
1771        Args:
1772            filename (str): The absolute filepath to the image.
1773            
1774        Returns:
1775            image_registered (cvImage, bool): Registered image if successful; False if dimensions do not match those of base moving image."""
1776
1777        points_source = self.points_toregister
1778        points_destination = self.points_reference
1779
1780        filename_toregister = filename
1781
1782        # Load image to be registered
1783        if filename_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1784            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1785            if image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1786                image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister) 
1787        else:
1788            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister)
1789        image_toregister = image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1790        image_toregister_dims = image_toregister.shape
1791        image_toregister_height = image_toregister_dims[0]
1792        image_toregister_width = image_toregister_dims[1]
1793
1794        if (image_toregister_height != self.image_toregister_height) or (image_toregister_width != self.image_toregister_width):
1795            return False
1796
1797        # Resize
1798        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1799        aspect_toregister = image_toregister_width/image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1800
1801        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1802            image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1803            image_toregister_resize_height = int(image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1804        else: # If the toregister narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1805            image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1806            image_toregister_resize_width = int(image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1807            
1808        image_toregister_resize_dims = (image_toregister_resize_width, image_toregister_resize_height)
1809        image_toregister_resize = resize(image_toregister, image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1810
1811        # Pad
1812        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1813        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1814        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - image_toregister_resize_height
1815        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - image_toregister_resize_width
1816        if image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1817            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1818        else:
1819            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1820
1821        image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1822        image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1823
1824        image = image_toregister_resize
1825        width = image_toregister_resize_width
1826        height = image_toregister_resize_height
1827        size = (width, height)
1828
1829        transform = getPerspectiveTransform(points_source, points_destination)
1830
1831        image_registered = warpPerspective(image, transform, size)
1832
1833        return image_registered
1834
1835    def display_loading_grayout(self, boolean, text=None, pseudo_load_time=0.2):
1836        """Show/hide grayout screen for loading sequences.
1837
1838        Args:
1839            boolean (bool): True to show grayout; False to hide.
1840            text (str): The text to show on the grayout.
1841            pseudo_load_time (float): The delay (in seconds) to hide the grayout to give users a feeling of action.
1842        """ 
1843        if text:
1844            self.loading_grayout_label.setText(text)
1845        if not boolean:
1846            self.loading_grayout_label.setText("Loading...")
1847        self.loading_grayout_label.setVisible(boolean)
1848        if boolean:
1849            self.loading_grayout_label.repaint()
1850        if not boolean:
1851            time.sleep(pseudo_load_time)
1852        self.loading.emit(boolean)
1853

1896                QLabel { 
1897                    font-size: 10pt;
1898                    color: white;
1899                    border: 0.15em solid lightGray;
1900                    background-color: rgba(31,31,31,223);
1901                    padding: 1.2em;
1902                    } 
1903                """)

1905            self.result_placeholder_label.raise_()

1950        layout.addWidget(self.about_button, 0, 0, QtCore.Qt.AlignTop|QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
1951        layout.setContentsMargins(2,2,2,2)
1952        
1953        self.central_widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()
1954        self.central_widget.setLayout(layout)
1955
1956        self.setCentralWidget(self.central_widget)
1957        self.setStyleSheet("""
1958            QWidget { font-size: 9pt }
1959            QSplitter::handle{ 
1960                background-color: 
1961                    qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:0, y2:1,
1962                        stop:0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1963                        stop:0.4850 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1964                        stop:0.4851 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1965                        stop:0.4899 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1966                        stop:0.4900 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1967                        stop:0.4975 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1968                        stop:0.4976 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1969                        stop:0.5024 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1970                        stop:0.5025 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1971                        stop:0.5100 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1972                        stop:0.5101 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1973                        stop:0.5149 rgba(63, 63, 63, 255),
1974                        stop:0.5150 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0),
1975                        stop:1 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)
1976                        );
1977                margin-left: 0.15em; margin-right: 0.15em}
1978                """)
1979        
1980        self.readSettings()
1981
1982    def readSettings(self):
1983        """Read application settings."""
1984        settings = QtCore.QSettings()
1985
1986        pos = settings.value('pos', QtCore.QPoint(100, 100))
1987        size = settings.value('size', QtCore.QSize(1100, 600))
1988        self.move(pos)
1989        self.resize(size)
1990
1991        if settings.contains('windowgeometry'):
1992            self.restoreGeometry(settings.value('windowgeometry'))
1993        if settings.contains('windowstate'):
1994            self.restoreState(settings.value('windowstate'))
1995
1996    def writeSettings(self):
1997        """Write application settings."""
1998        settings = QtCore.QSettings()
1999        settings.setValue('pos', self.pos())
2000        settings.setValue('size', self.size())
2001        settings.setValue('windowgeometry', self.saveGeometry())
2002        settings.setValue('windowstate', self.saveState())
2003
2004    def closeEvent(self, event):
2005        """QEvent: Override close event to save application settings."""
2006        self.writeSettings()
2007        event.accept()
2008
2009    def loading(self, boolean):
2010        """bool: For enabling/disabling interface when loading (True=disable; False=enable)."""
2011        self.setEnabled(not boolean)
2012
2013
2014def main():
2015    """Run MainWindow as main app.
2016    
2017    Attributes:
2018        app (QApplication): Starts and holds the main event loop of application.
2019        w (MainWindow): The main window.
2020    """
2021    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
2022    QtCore.QSettings.setDefaultFormat(QtCore.QSettings.IniFormat)
2023    app.setOrganizationName(COMPANY)
2024    app.setOrganizationDomain(DOMAIN)
2025    app.setApplicationName(APPNAME)
2026    app.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(":/icon.png"))
2027
2028    w = MainWindow()
2029    w.show()
2030    sys.exit(app.exec_())

class CustomQGraphicsLineItem(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsLineItem): 
 75class CustomQGraphicsLineItem(QtWidgets.QGraphicsLineItem):
 76    """Overides QGraphicsLineItem to emit signal in scene that it has changed.
 77    
 78    See parent class for documentation.
 79    """
 80
 81    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
 82        super().__init__(*args, **kwargs)
 83        self.travel_start = QtCore.QPointF()
 84        self.travel_end = QtCore.QPointF()
 85        self.undo_widget = None
 86        self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel = False
 87
 88    def itemChange(self, change, value):
 89        """"Extend to emit signal from scene that an item has changed."""
 90        if change == QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemScenePositionHasChanged:
 91            self.scene().position_changed_qgraphicsitem.emit()
 92        return super().itemChange(change, value)
 93    
 94    def mousePressEvent(self, event: QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent) -> None:
 95        """"Extend to record scene position at moment when mouse was pressed."""
 96        self.travel_start = self.scenePos()
 97        return super().mousePressEvent(event)
 98    
 99    def mouseReleaseEvent(self, event: QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent) -> None:
100        """"Extend to record scene position at moment when mouse was released and emit a travel occurred."""
101        self.travel_end = self.scenePos()
102        self.tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made()
103        return super().mouseReleaseEvent(event)
104
105    def set_position_manually(self, x, y):
106        """"Set position manually with scene coordinates and record as a travel."""
107        self.travel_start = self.scenePos()
108        self.setPos(x, y)
109        self.travel_end = self.scenePos()
110        self.tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made()
111
112    def tell_undo_widget_travel_was_made(self):
113        """"Set associated undo widget that a travel was made."""
114        if self.undo_widget:
115            self.undo_widget.set_as_undo()
116            if not self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel:
117                self.undo_widget_has_seen_travel = True
118                self.undo_widget.setEnabled(True)
119
120    def undo_last_travel(self):
121        """"Undo last recorded travel."""
122        self.setPos(self.travel_start)
123
124    def redo_last_travel(self):
125        """"Redo last recorded travel."""
126        self.setPos(self.travel_end)
127
128    def set_undo_widget(self, widget=None):
129        """"Set associated undo widget."""
130        self.undo_widget = widget

See parent class for documentation.
