class RegisterView(aux_splitview.SplitView): 
134class RegisterView(SplitView):
135    """Viewer with registration control points for target and moving images.
136
137    Extends SplitView by adding control points for four-point perspective transformation.
138
139    Overrides SplitView by blocking right-click menu.
140    
141    See parent class for instantiation documentation.
142    """
143
144    registration_point_emitted = QtCore.pyqtSignal(QtCore.QPointF, int)
145    registration_point_changed = QtCore.pyqtSignal()
146
147    def __init__(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
148            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth):
149
150        super().__init__(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, 
151            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth, allow_main_opacity=False)
152        self.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose)
153        
154        self._scene_main_topleft.disable_right_click = True
155
156        self.registration_points = []
157
158        offset = 0.3
159
160        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=offset, placement_y=offset, text="1"))
161        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=1-offset, placement_y=offset, text="2"))
162        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=offset, placement_y=1-offset, text="3"))
163        self.registration_points.append(self.make_registration_point(placement_x=1-offset, placement_y=1-offset, text="4"))
164
165        i = -1
166        for point in self.registration_points:
167            i += 1
168            self._scene_main_topleft.addItem(self.registration_points[i])
169
170        self._scene_main_topleft.position_changed_qgraphicsitem.connect(self.on_registration_point_moved)
171
172    def on_registration_point_moved(self):
173        """Emit signals when control point is moved."""
174        self.registration_point_changed.emit()
175        self.emit_registration_points()
176        return
177
178    def emit_registration_points(self):
179        """Emit the position of all control points."""
180        i = -1
181        for point in self.registration_points:
182            i += 1
183            scene_pos = self.registration_points[i].scenePos()
184            self.registration_point_emitted.emit(scene_pos, i)
185
186    def make_registration_point(self, placement_x, placement_y, text):
187        """Create a control point.
188        
189        Args:
190            placement_x (float): Horizontal position as a proportion of the image's width (0-1).
191            placement_y (float): Vertical position as a proportion of the image's width (0-1).
192            text (str): Text to show.
193
194        Returns:
195            line_item_bounding_box (CustomQGraphicsLineItem): Control point as a QGraphicsItem.
196        """
197        width_pixmap_main_topleft = self._pixmapItem_main_topleft.pixmap().width()
198        height_pixmap_main_topleft = self._pixmapItem_main_topleft.pixmap().height()
199
200        placement_x = placement_x
201        placement_y = placement_y
202
203        pos_x = width_pixmap_main_topleft*placement_x
204        pos_y = height_pixmap_main_topleft*placement_y
205
206        pos_on_scene = QtCore.QPointF(pos_x, pos_y)
207
208        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
209        pen.setWidth(2)
210        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white) # setColor also works
211        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
212        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
213            
214        brush = QtGui.QBrush()
215        brush.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
216        brush.setStyle(QtCore.Qt.SolidPattern)
217
218        width = 4
219        height = 4
220
221        point_topleft = QtCore.QPointF(-width/2, -height/2)
222        point_bottomright = QtCore.QPointF(width/2,height/2)
223
224        ellipse_rect = QtCore.QRectF(point_topleft, point_bottomright)
225        ellipse_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsEllipseItem(ellipse_rect)
226
227        ellipse_item.setPos(0,0)
228        
229        ellipse_item.setBrush(brush)
230        ellipse_item.setPen(pen)
231
232        ellipse_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations)
233
234        self.shadow = QtWidgets.QGraphicsDropShadowEffect(blurRadius=8, color=QtGui.QColor(0, 0, 0, 255), xOffset=0, yOffset=0)
235
236        dx = 30
237        dy = -30
238        point_p1 = QtCore.QPointF(0,0)
239        point_p2 = QtCore.QPointF(dx,dy)
240        line = QtCore.QLineF(point_p1, point_p2)
241        line_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsLineItem(line)
242        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
243        pen.setWidth(2)
244        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
245        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
246        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
247        line_item.setPen(pen)
248        line_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations)
249        line_item.setPos(0,0)
250        line_item.setGraphicsEffect(self.shadow)
251
252        line_item_bounding_box = CustomQGraphicsLineItem(line)
253        pen = QtGui.QPen() 
254        pen.setWidth(20)
255        pen.setColor(QtCore.Qt.transparent)
256        pen.setCapStyle(QtCore.Qt.SquareCap)
257        pen.setJoinStyle(QtCore.Qt.MiterJoin)
258        line_item_bounding_box.setPen(pen)
259        line_item_bounding_box.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIsMovable | QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations | QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemSendsScenePositionChanges)
260        line_item_bounding_box.set_position_manually(pos_on_scene.x(),pos_on_scene.y())
261
262        text_item = QtWidgets.QGraphicsTextItem(text)
263        font = text_item.font()
264        font.setPointSize(14)
265        text_item.setFont(font)
266        text_item.setPos(dx+1,dy-18)
267        text_item.setDefaultTextColor(QtCore.Qt.white)
268        text_item.setFlags(QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIgnoresTransformations) # QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem.ItemIsSelectable
269
270        text_item.setParentItem(line_item)
271        ellipse_item.setParentItem(line_item)
272        line_item.setParentItem(line_item_bounding_box)
273
274        return line_item_bounding_box
275    
276    def set_point(self, which_point: int, x_or_y: str, value: float):
277        """"Set position of control point coordinate in scene.
278        
279        Args:
280            which_point (int): Index of control point to set (1, 2, 3, or 4).
281            x_or_y (str): String of coordinate ("x" or "y").
282            value (float): Value of coordinate in scene.
283        """
284        
285        if which_point < 1 or which_point > 4:
286            return
287        
288        i = which_point - 1
289        scene_pos = self.registration_points[i]
290
291        if x_or_y == "x":
292            x = value
293            y = scene_pos.y()
294        elif x_or_y == "y":
295            x = scene_pos.x()
296            y = value
297        else:
298            return
299        
300        self.registration_points[i].set_position_manually(x, y)
301
302    def set_points(self, pairs: list=None):
303        """Set position of all control points on scene with x,y pairs.
304        
305        Args:
306            pairs (list): Position x,y pairs of control points ([[x1,y1],[x2,y2],[x3,y3],[x4,y4]]).
307        """
308        if len(pairs) != 4:
309            return
310        for i, pair in enumerate(pairs):
311            self.registration_points[i].set_position_manually(pair[0], pair[1])

class DragAndDropWidget(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget):

319    """ 
320
321    file_path_dragged_and_dropped = QtCore.pyqtSignal(str)    
322
323    def __init__(self):
324        super().__init__()
325
326        self.image_filetypes = [
327            ".jpeg", ".jpg", ".jpe", ".jif", ".jfif", ".jfi", ".pjpeg", ".pjp",
328            ".png",
329            ".tiff", ".tif",
330            ".bmp",
331            ".webp",
332            ".ico", ".cur"]
333
334        self.setAcceptDrops(True)
335
336    def dragEnterEvent(self, event):
337        """event: Override dragEnterEvent() to accept a single image file."""
338        if len(event.mimeData().urls()) is 1 and self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData()):
339            event.accept()
340        else:
341            event.ignore()
342
343    def dragMoveEvent(self, event):
344        """event: Override dragMoveEvent() to accept a single image file."""
345        if len(event.mimeData().urls()) is 1 and self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData()):
346            event.accept()
347        else:
348            event.ignore()
349
350    def dropEvent(self, event):
351        """event: Override dropEvent() to accept a single image file."""
352        urls = self.grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(event.mimeData())
353
354        if len(urls) is 1 and urls:
355            event.setDropAction(QtCore.Qt.CopyAction)
356            file_path = urls[0].toLocalFile()
357            self.file_path_dragged_and_dropped.emit(file_path)
358            event.accept()
359        else:
360            event.ignore()
361
362    def grab_image_urls_from_mimedata(self, mimedata):
363        """mimeData: Get urls (filepaths) from drop event."""
364        urls = list()
365        for url in mimedata.urls():
366            if any([filetype in url.toLocalFile().lower() for filetype in self.image_filetypes]):
367                urls.append(url)
368        return urls

Drag-and-drop widget for single image files to emit their filepaths.

class Registrator(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget): 
 372class Registrator(QtWidgets.QWidget):
 373    """Interface to register a moving image to a target image by setting control points in viewers of each.
 374
 375    Instantiate without input.
 376
 377    Registration is based on four-point perspective transformation where the control points are manually dragged.
 378    
 379    Interface sequence: 
 380        Load the target image by drag-and-drop or open dialog. 
 381        Load the moving image by drag-and-drop or open dialog.
 382        Set the control points on each image by click-and-drag. 
 383        Preview the registered image and compare with the target image in a split-view. 
 384        Adjust and re-compare the control points, if needed.
 385        Save the registered image.
 386        (Optional) Batch-register multiple images with the current registration, if needed.
 387    """
 388    
 389    loading = QtCore.pyqtSignal(bool)
 390
 391    def __init__(self):

 761        self.result_layout.addWidget(self.result_placeholder_label, 1, 0, 1, 3)
 762        self.result_layout.addWidget(self.result_button_widget, 2, 0, 1, 3)

 775        result_splitter_widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()

 790        self.loading_grayout_label.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignCenter | QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 791        # self.loading_grayout_label.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.WA_TransparentForMouseEvents)

 817    def on_registration_point_emitted_reference(self, pos_on_scene, index):
 818        """Update the displayed coordinates of a given target control point.
 819        
 820        Triggered when a control point is moved on the reference image.
 821        
 822        Args:
 823            pos_on_scene (QPointF): The position on the scene of the control point.
 824            index (int): The index of the control point (which control point it is).
 825        """
 826        x = pos_on_scene.x()
 827        y = pos_on_scene.y()
 828        i = index + 1
 829
 830        x_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(x)
 831        y_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(y)
 832
 833        if i is 1:
 834            self.reference_point_label_x1.setText(x_str)
 835            self.reference_point_label_x1.value = x
 836            self.reference_point_label_y1.setText(y_str)
 837            self.reference_point_label_y1.value = y
 838        elif i is 2:
 839            self.reference_point_label_x2.setText(x_str)
 840            self.reference_point_label_x2.value = x
 841            self.reference_point_label_y2.setText(y_str)
 842            self.reference_point_label_y2.value = y
 843        elif i is 3:
 844            self.reference_point_label_x3.setText(x_str)
 845            self.reference_point_label_x3.value = x
 846            self.reference_point_label_y3.setText(y_str)
 847            self.reference_point_label_y3.value = y
 848        elif i is 4:
 849            self.reference_point_label_x4.setText(x_str)
 850            self.reference_point_label_x4.value = x
 851            self.reference_point_label_y4.setText(y_str)
 852            self.reference_point_label_y4.value = y
 853
 854        self.points_reference[i-1][0] = x
 855        self.points_reference[i-1][1] = y
 856
 857    def on_registration_point_emitted_toregister(self, pos_on_scene, index):
 858        """Update the displayed coordinates of a given moving control point.
 859        
 860        Triggered when a control point is moved on the to-be-registered image.
 861        
 862        Args:
 863            pos_on_scene (QPointF): The position on the scene of the control point.
 864            index (int): The index of the control point (which control point it is).
 865        """
 866        x = pos_on_scene.x()
 867        y = pos_on_scene.y()
 868        i = index + 1
 869
 870        x_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(x)
 871        y_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(y)
 872
 873        if i is 1:
 874            self.toregister_point_label_x1.setText(x_str)
 875            self.toregister_point_label_x1.value = x
 876            self.toregister_point_label_y1.setText(y_str)
 877            self.toregister_point_label_y1.value = y
 878        elif i is 2:
 879            self.toregister_point_label_x2.setText(x_str)
 880            self.toregister_point_label_x2.value = x
 881            self.toregister_point_label_y2.setText(y_str)
 882            self.toregister_point_label_y2.value = y
 883        elif i is 3:
 884            self.toregister_point_label_x3.setText(x_str)
 885            self.toregister_point_label_x3.value = x
 886            self.toregister_point_label_y3.setText(y_str)
 887            self.toregister_point_label_y3.value = y
 888        elif i is 4:
 889            self.toregister_point_label_x4.setText(x_str)
 890            self.toregister_point_label_x4.value = x
 891            self.toregister_point_label_y4.setText(y_str)
 892            self.toregister_point_label_y4.value = y
 893
 894        self.points_toregister[i-1][0] = x
 895        self.points_toregister[i-1][1] = y
 896
 897    def on_registration_point_changed(self):
 898        """Record that a registration point has changed on either image."""
 899        self.registration_point_changed_but_not_applied = True
 900        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
 901        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
 902        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()

 904    def load_reference(self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None):
 905        """Load an image as the target image.
 906        
 907        Args:
 908            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the reference image.
 909            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 910            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 911            filename_bottomright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
 912        """
 913        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Loading reference image...")
 914
 915        self.fullpath_reference = filename_main_topleft
 916        
 917        self.pixmap_reference = QtGui.QPixmap(self.fullpath_reference)
 918        pixmap_topright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_topright)
 919        pixmap_bottomleft = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomleft)
 920        pixmap_bottomright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomright)
 921
 922        angle = get_exif_rotation_angle(self.fullpath_reference)
 923        if angle:
 924            self.pixmap_reference = self.pixmap_reference.transformed(QtGui.QTransform().rotate(angle))
 925
 926        self.viewer_reference = self.create_viewer_reference(self.pixmap_reference, self.fullpath_reference, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
 927        self.reference_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_reference, 1, 0)
 928        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_reference.fitToWindow)
 929        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_reference.emit_registration_points)
 930
 931        # Registration
 932        self.image_reference_width = self.pixmap_reference.width()
 933        self.image_reference_height = self.pixmap_reference.height()
 934        self.viewer_reference.registration_point_emitted.connect(self.on_registration_point_emitted_reference)
 935        self.set_enabled_toregister(True)
 936
 937        # Line edits
 938        self.reference_point_label_x1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 939        self.reference_point_label_y1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 940        self.reference_point_label_x2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 941        self.reference_point_label_y2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 942        self.reference_point_label_x3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 943        self.reference_point_label_y3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 944        self.reference_point_label_x4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 945        self.reference_point_label_y4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_reference.set_point)
 946
 947        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
 948
 949    def create_viewer_reference(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
 950        """Create a viewer for the target image.
 951
 952        Args:
 953            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The target image pixmap.
 954            filename_main_topleft (str): The target image filename.
 955            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 956            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 957            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
 958
 959        Returns:
 960            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
 961        """
 962        name = "Reference"
 963        transform_mode_smooth = False
 964        viewer = RegisterView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth)
 965
 966        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(filename_main_topleft)
 967        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
 968
 969        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_reference)
 970        viewer.registration_point_changed.connect(self.on_registration_point_changed)
 971
 972        for button, point in zip(self.reference_point_undo_buttons, viewer.registration_points):
 973            button.set_control_point_widget(point)
 974            point.set_undo_widget(button)
 975
 976        return viewer
 977
 978    def close_viewer_reference(self):
 979        """Close the target image viewer."""
 980
 981        box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
 982        title = "Close and reset control points?"
 983
 984        if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
 985            text = "Closing the reference image will also close the moving image and reset all control points."
 986        else:
 987            text = "Closing the reference image will reset its control points."
 988        
 989        box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
 990        box.addButton("Close and reset", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
 991        box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
 992        response = box.exec_()
 993
 994        if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
 995            return
 996
 997        if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
 998        
 999            if self.viewer_reference:
1000                self.viewer_reference.close()
1001                self.viewer_reference.deleteLater()
1002                del self.pixmap_reference
1003                if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1004                    self.close_viewer_toregister(bypass_message=True)
1005                self.set_enabled_toregister(False)
1006                for button in self.reference_point_undo_buttons:
1007                    button.set_control_point_widget(None)
1008
1009    def dragged_and_dropped_reference(self, str):
1010        """str: Load the target image from a drag-and-drop filepath signal."""
1011        self.load_reference(filename_main_topleft=str)

1013    def select_via_dialog_reference(self):
1014        """Select and load the target image via dialog window."""
1015        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Selecting reference image...")
1016
1017        filepath = self.fullpath_reference
1018        filters = "\
1019            All supported image files (*.jpeg *.jpg  *.png *.tiff *.tif *.gif *.bmp);;\
1020            JPEG image files (*.jpeg *.jpg);;\
1021            PNG image files (*.png);;\
1022            TIFF image files (*.tiff *.tif);;\
1023            BMP (*.bmp)"
1024        filename, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, "Select reference image", filepath, filters)
1025
1026        if filename:
1027            self.display_loading_grayout(False, pseudo_load_time=0)
1028            self.load_reference(filename_main_topleft=filename)
1029        else:
1030            self.display_loading_grayout(False, pseudo_load_time=0)
1031
1032    # "To register" functions for the image which is to be registered to the reference image
1033    def load_toregister(self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None):
1034        """Load an image as the moving image.
1035
1036        Resizes and pads the moving image to match the dimensions of the target image.
1037        
1038        Args:
1039            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the to-be-registered image.
1040            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1041            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1042            filename_bottomright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1043        """
1044        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Loading image to be registered...")
1045
1046        self.fullpath_toregister = filename_main_topleft
1047
1048        # Load image
1049        if self.fullpath_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1050            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1051            if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1052                self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister) 
1053        else:
1054            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister)
1055        self.image_toregister = self.image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1056        self.image_toregister_dims = self.image_toregister.shape
1057        self.image_toregister_height = self.image_toregister_dims[0]
1058        self.image_toregister_width = self.image_toregister_dims[1]
1059
1060        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1061        aspect_toregister = self.image_toregister_width/self.image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1062
1063        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1064            self.image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1065            self.image_toregister_resize_height = int(self.image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1066        else: # If the toregister is narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1067            self.image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1068            self.image_toregister_resize_width = int(self.image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1069            
1070        self.image_toregister_resize_dims = (self.image_toregister_resize_width, self.image_toregister_resize_height)
1071        self.image_toregister_resize = resize(self.image_toregister, self.image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1072
1073        # Pad
1074        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1075        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1076        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - self.image_toregister_resize_height
1077        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - self.image_toregister_resize_width
1078        if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1079            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1080        else:
1081            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1082
1083        self.image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1084        self.image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1085
1086        # Convert cvImage to QPixmap
1087        height, width, channels = self.image_toregister_resize.shape
1088        
1089        total_bytes = self.image_toregister_resize.nbytes
1090        bytes_per_line = int(total_bytes/height)
1091        # bytes_per_line = width*3
1092        if channels is 4:
1093            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGBA8888).rgbSwapped()
1094        else:
1095            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped()
1096
1097        self.pixmap_toregister_resize = QtGui.QPixmap(qimage)
1098        pixmap_topright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_topright)
1099        pixmap_bottomleft = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomleft)
1100        pixmap_bottomright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomright)
1101
1102        self.viewer_toregister = self.create_viewer_toregister(self.pixmap_toregister_resize, self.fullpath_toregister, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
1103        self.toregister_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_toregister, 1, 0)
1104        
1105        self.viewer_toregister.zoomFactor = self.viewer_reference.zoomFactor
1106        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.centerView)
1107        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points)
1108        
1109        self.viewer_toregister.registration_point_emitted.connect(self.on_registration_point_emitted_toregister)
1110
1111        self.set_enabled_result(True)
1112        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
1113        self.result_batch_widget.setEnabled(True)
1114
1115        self.viewer_toregister_isclosed = False
1116
1117        self.viewer_reference.emit_registration_points()
1118        self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points()
1119
1120        # Line edits
1121        self.toregister_point_label_x1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1122        self.toregister_point_label_y1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1123        self.toregister_point_label_x2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1124        self.toregister_point_label_y2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1125        self.toregister_point_label_x3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1126        self.toregister_point_label_y3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1127        self.toregister_point_label_x4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1128        self.toregister_point_label_y4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1129
1130        self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1131
1132    def create_viewer_toregister(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
1133        """Create a viewer for the moving image.
1134
1135        Args:
1136            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The moving image pixmap.
1137            filename_main_topleft (str): The moving image filename.
1138            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1139            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1140            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1141
1142        Returns:
1143            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
1144        """
1145        name = "To be registered"
1146        transform_mode_smooth = False
1147        viewer = RegisterView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth)
1148
1149        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(filename_main_topleft)
1150        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1151
1152        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_toregister)
1153        viewer.registration_point_changed.connect(self.on_registration_point_changed)
1154
1155        for button, point in zip(self.toregister_point_undo_buttons, viewer.registration_points):
1156            button.set_control_point_widget(point)
1157            point.set_undo_widget(button)
1158
1159        return viewer
1160
1161    def close_viewer_toregister(self, bypass_message=False):
1162        """Close the moving image viewer."""
1163
1164        response = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole
1165
1166        if not bypass_message:
1167            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1168            title = "Close and reset control points?"
1169            text = "Closing the moving image will reset its control points."
1170            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1171            box.addButton("Close and reset", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1172            box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1173            response = box.exec_()
1174
1175            if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1176                return
1177
1178        if bypass_message or (response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole):
1179
1180            if not self.viewer_toregister_isclosed:
1181
1182                self.viewer_toregister.close()
1183                self.viewer_toregister.deleteLater()
1184                del self.pixmap_toregister_resize
1185                self.image_toregister = None
1186                self.viewer_toregister_isclosed = True
1187
1188                for button in self.toregister_point_undo_buttons:
1189                    button.set_control_point_widget(None)
1190
1191                self.result_widget.setEnabled(False)
1192
1193                if not self.viewer_result_isclosed:
1194                    self.close_viewer_result()
1195
1196                self.set_enabled_result(False)
1197                self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(False)
1198                self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1199                self.result_batch_widget.setEnabled(False)
1200                self.filepaths_batch = None
1201                self.folderpath_batch = None
1202                self.result_batch_checkbox.setChecked(False)
1203                self.result_batch_folder_button.setEnabled(False)
1204                self.result_batch_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1205

1231    def register_and_load_result(self):
1232        """Register the moving image and load the preview in a split-view with the target image."""
1233        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(False)
1234        self.registration_point_changed_but_not_applied = False
1235
1236        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Registering and loading preview...")
1237        
1238        self.register_result()
1239        self.load_result()       
1240        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(True)
1241

1244    def register_result(self):
1245        """Register the moving image."""
1246        points_source = self.points_toregister
1247        points_destination = self.points_reference
1248
1249        image = self.image_toregister_resize
1250        width = self.image_toregister_resize_width
1251        height = self.image_toregister_resize_height
1252        size = (width, height)
1253
1254        transform = getPerspectiveTransform(points_source, points_destination)
1255
1256        self.image_registered = warpPerspective(image, transform, size)
1257
1258        # Convert cvImage to QPixmap
1259        height, width, channels = self.image_registered.shape
1260        total_bytes = self.image_registered.nbytes
1261        bytes_per_line = int(total_bytes/height)
1262        if channels is 4:
1263            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_registered.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGBA8888).rgbSwapped()
1264        else:
1265            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_registered.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped()
1266
1267        self.pixmap_registered = QtGui.QPixmap(qimage)
1268
1269    def load_result(self):
1270        """Load the registered image into a viewer."""
1271        if not self.viewer_result_isclosed:
1272            self.viewer_result.close()
1273            self.viewer_result.deleteLater()
1274
1275        self.filename_result_reference = self.fullpath_reference
1276        self.filename_result_registered = self.fullpath_toregister
1277        
1278        # Split view left=reference, right=registered
1279        pixmap = self.pixmap_reference
1280        pixmap_topright = self.pixmap_registered
1281        pixmap_bottomright = self.pixmap_registered
1282        pixmap_bottomleft = self.pixmap_registered
1283
1284        self.viewer_result = self.create_viewer_result(pixmap, self.filename_result_reference, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
1285        self.result_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_result, 1, 0, 1, 3)
1286        
1287        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_result.fitToWindow)
1288
1289        self.viewer_result_isclosed = False
1290        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()
1291
1292    def create_viewer_result(self, pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, pixmap_topright=None, pixmap_bottomleft=None, pixmap_bottomright=None):
1293        """Create a viewer for the registered moving image.
1294
1295        Args:
1296            pixmap_main_topleft (QPixmap): The registered image pixmap.
1297            filename_main_topleft (str): The registered image filename.
1298            pixmap_topright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1299            pixmap_bottomleft (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1300            pixmap_bottomright (QPixmap): Unused. Keep as None.
1301
1302        Returns:
1303            viewer (RegisterView): The viewer instance.
1304        """
1305        name = "Result"
1306        viewer = ResultView(pixmap_main_topleft, filename_main_topleft, name,
1307            pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright, transform_mode_smooth=False)
1308        viewer.label_main_topleft.setText(self.filename_result_reference)
1309        viewer.label_main_topleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1310        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1311        viewer.label_bottomleft.setText(self.filename_result_registered.replace('.', suffix))
1312        viewer.label_bottomleft.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1313        opacity_topright = 33
1314        opacity_bottomright = 66
1315        viewer.set_opacity_topright(opacity_topright)
1316        viewer.set_opacity_bottomright(opacity_bottomright)
1317        viewer.label_topright.setText(f"Registered {opacity_topright}% overlayed")
1318        viewer.label_topright.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1319        viewer.label_bottomright.setText(f"Registered {opacity_bottomright}% overlayed")
1320        viewer.label_bottomright.set_visible_based_on_text(True)
1321
1322        viewer.was_clicked_close_pushbutton.connect(self.close_viewer_result)
1323
1324        return viewer
1325

1330            self.viewer_result.deleteLater()
1331            del self.pixmap_registered
1332            self.image_registered = None
1333            self.viewer_result_isclosed = True
1334            self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
1335        self.result_save_button.setEnabled(False)
1336        self.refresh_result_placeholder_label()

1338    def save_result(self):
1339        """Open a save dialog window to save the registered image to file."""
1340        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Saving registered image...")
1341
1342        fullpath_initial = self.fullpath_toregister
1343        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1344        fullpath_initial = fullpath_initial.replace('.', suffix)
1345
1346        name_filters = "JPEG (*.jpeg);; JPG (*.jpg);; PNG (*.png);; TIFF (*.tiff);; TIF (*.tif);; BMP (*.bmp)"
1347
1348        selected_filter = None
1349
1350        if fullpath_initial.endswith('.jpeg'):
1351            selected_filter = "JPEG (*.jpeg)"
1352        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.jpg'):
1353            selected_filter = "JPG (*.jpg)"
1354        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.png'):
1355            selected_filter = "PNG (*.png)"
1356        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.tiff'):
1357            selected_filter = "TIFF (*.tiff)"
1358        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.tif'):
1359            selected_filter = "TIF (*.tif)"
1360        elif fullpath_initial.endswith('.bmp'):
1361            selected_filter = "BMP (*.bmp)"
1362
1363        fullpath_selected, _ = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self, "Save registered image", fullpath_initial, name_filters, selected_filter)
1364
1365        if fullpath_selected:
1366            self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Saving registered image '" + fullpath_selected.split("/")[-1] + "'...")
1367            if fullpath_selected.endswith('.jpg') or fullpath_selected.endswith('.jpeg'):
1368                imwrite(fullpath_selected, self.image_registered, [int(IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), 100])
1369            else:
1370                imwrite(fullpath_selected, self.image_registered)
1371
1372            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1373            title = "Auto-save control points?"
1374            text = "Do you also want to save the control points?"
1375            text += "\n\nThis will automatically save them to .csv control point file in the same directory as the registered image. You can then later load and redo the registration if needed."
1376            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1377            box.addButton("Auto-save control points", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1378            box.addButton("Skip", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1379            response = box.exec_()
1380
1381            if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1382
1383                directory_csv = os.path.dirname(fullpath_selected)
1384                directory_csv = directory_csv + "\\"
1385                filename_csv = self.generate_points_filename()
1386                fullpath_csv = directory_csv + filename_csv
1387
1388                filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1389                filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1390
1391                points_reference = self.points_reference 
1392                points_toregister = self.points_toregister
1393
1394                self.save_points(fullpath_csv,
1395                                filename_reference, points_reference, 
1396                                [filename_toregister], points_toregister)
1397
1398        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

1436    def save_batch(self):
1437        """Register and save the selected batch files to the selected destination folder."""
1438        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Registering and saving batch image(s)...")
1439
1440        one_or_more_images_mismatch = False
1441
1442        fullpaths = self.filepaths_batch
1443        folderpath = self.folderpath_batch
1444
1445        one_or_more_already_exists = False
1446
1447        for fullpath in fullpaths:
1448            fullpath_intended = self.generate_registered_fullpath(folderpath, fullpath)[0]
1449            if os.path.isfile(fullpath_intended):
1450                one_or_more_already_exists = True
1451
1452        if one_or_more_already_exists:
1453            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1454            title = "Overwrite already registered files?"
1455            text = "One or more of the images you selected already exist as registered images in the selected destination folder."
1456            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1457            box.addButton("Overwrite and proceed", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1458            box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1459            response = box.exec_()
1460
1461            if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1462                self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1463                return
1464        
1465        fullpaths_successful = []
1466
1467        for i, fullpath in enumerate(fullpaths):
1468
1469            text = "Registering batch image '" + fullpath.split("/")[-1] + "' (" + str(i+1) + "/" + str(len(fullpaths)) + ")..."
1470            self.display_loading_grayout(True, text)
1471
1472            image_registered = self.read_resize_pad_register(fullpath)
1473
1474            if image_registered is not False:
1475                
1476                fullpath_registered, filename_registered = self.generate_registered_fullpath(folderpath, fullpath)
1477
1478                text = "Saving batch image '" + filename_registered + "' (" + str(i+1) + "/" + str(len(fullpaths)) + ")..."
1479                self.display_loading_grayout(True, text)
1480                
1481                if fullpath_registered.endswith('.jpg') or fullpath_registered.endswith('.jpeg'):
1482                    imwrite(fullpath_registered, image_registered, [int(IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), 100])
1483                else:
1484                    imwrite(fullpath_registered, image_registered)
1485
1486                fullpaths_successful.append(fullpath)
1487            else:
1488                one_or_more_images_mismatch = True
1489
1490            QtWidgets.QApplication.processEvents()
1491
1492        box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information
1493        title = "Batch complete"
1494        text = "Batch registration and saving is complete."
1495        box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1496        box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1497        box.exec_()
1498
1499        if one_or_more_images_mismatch:
1500            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1501            title = "One or more unsuccessful registrations"
1502            text = "One or more images selected in the batch were not registered. Their height and width do not match those of the moving image where the control points are set."
1503            box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1504            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1505            box.exec_()
1506
1507        if len(fullpaths_successful) > 0:
1508            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Question
1509            title = "Auto-save control points?"
1510            text = "Do you also want to save the control points?"
1511            text += "\n\nThis will auto-save them to .csv in the same directory as the registered images, allowing you to load and redo the registration if needed."
1512            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1513            box.addButton("Auto-save control points", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1514            box.addButton("Skip", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1515            response = box.exec_()
1516
1517            if response == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1518
1519                directory_csv = folderpath
1520                directory_csv = directory_csv + "\\"
1521                filename_csv = self.generate_points_filename(batch=True)
1522                fullpath_csv = directory_csv + filename_csv
1523
1524                filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1525                filenames_toregister = []
1526                for fullpath in fullpaths_successful:
1527                    filenames_toregister.append(os.path.basename(fullpath))
1528
1529                points_reference = self.points_reference 
1530                points_toregister = self.points_toregister
1531
1532                self.save_points(fullpath_csv,
1533                                filename_reference, points_reference, 
1534                                filenames_toregister, points_toregister)
1535
1536        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

1571    def generate_points_filename(self, batch: bool=False):
1572        """str: Returns default filename for control points .csv."""
1573        filename_reference = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference)
1574        filename_toregister = os.path.basename(self.fullpath_toregister)
1575
1576        date_and_time = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H%M%S') # Sets the default filename with date and time 
1577
1578        if batch:
1579            filename_toregister = "Batch"
1580
1581        filename_csv = "Registration points" + " - " + filename_toregister.split('.')[0] + " to " + filename_reference.split('.')[0] + " - " + date_and_time + ".csv"
1582
1583        return filename_csv
1584    
1585    def generate_registered_fullpath(self, folderpath: str=None, fullpath_toregister: str=None):
1586        """str: Returns default fullpath and filename for an image to be registered given a destination folder."""
1587        fullpath_registered = None
1588        filename_registered = fullpath_toregister.split("/")[-1]
1589        suffix = "_registered_to_" + os.path.basename(self.fullpath_reference).split('.')[0] + "."
1590        filename_registered = filename_registered.replace('.', suffix)
1591        if folderpath:
1592            fullpath_registered = folderpath + "/" + filename_registered
1593
1594        return fullpath_registered, filename_registered

1624    def load_points(self,
1625                    fullpath: str=None,
1626                    filename_reference: str=None,
1627                    filename_toregister: str=None):
1628        """Get control points from .csv to target and moving images.
1629
1630        Checks whether current target image and moving image are those in the .csv file.
1631
1632        Args:
1633            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv of control points to be loaded.
1634            filename_reference (str): Filename of current target image.
1635            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename of current moving image.
1636
1637        Returns:
1638            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1639            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1640        """
1641        
1642        points_reference = []
1643        points_toregister = []
1644
1645        if fullpath:
1646
1647            with open(fullpath, "r", newline='') as csv_file:
1648                csv_reader = csv.reader(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1649                csv_list = list(csv_reader)
1650
1651            i = None
1652
1653            try:
1654                i = csv_list.index(["target"])
1655            except ValueError:
1656                box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1657                title = "Invalid .csv control point file"
1658                text = "The selected .csv control point file does not have a format accepted by this app."
1659                box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1660                box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1661                box.exec_()
1662            else:
1663                skip_reference = False
1664                skip_toregister = False
1665
1666                i += 1 # Move to target filename
1667                if not csv_list[i][0] == filename_reference:
1668                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1669                    title = "Filename mismatch target image"
1670                    text = "The filename of the reference image (the target image) does not match the target filename in the control point file."
1671                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1672                    box.addButton("Load reference points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1673                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1674                    response = box.exec_()
1675                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1676                        skip_reference = True
1677
1678                i += 2 # Move to moving filename
1679                try:
1680                    csv_list[i].index(filename_toregister)
1681                except ValueError:
1682                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1683                    title = "Filename mismatch moving image"
1684                    text = "The filename of the to-be-registered image (the moving image) does not match any moving filenames in the control point file."
1685                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1686                    box.addButton("Load moving points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1687                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1688                    response = box.exec_()
1689                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1690                        skip_toregister = True
1691
1692                i += 2 # Move to XY pairs
1693                point = -1
1694                for row in csv_list[i:]:
1695                    point += 1
1696                    if not skip_reference:
1697                        points_reference.append([float(row[0]), float(row[1])])
1698                        if not skip_toregister:
1699                            points_toregister.append([float(row[2]), float(row[3])])
1700
1701        return points_reference, points_toregister           
1702        
1703    def set_points(self,
1704                    points_reference,
1705                    points_toregister):
1706        """Set positions of control points for reference and to-register images.
1707        
1708        Args:
1709            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ].
1710            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ].
1711        """
1712        self.viewer_reference.set_points(points_reference)
1713        self.viewer_toregister.set_points(points_toregister)
1714
1715    def save_points(self, 
1716                    fullpath: str=None,
1717                    filename_reference: str=None, points_reference: list=None, 
1718                    filename_toregister: list=None, points_toregister: list=None):
1719        """Save the control points of the target image and moving image to a .csv with a given filepath.
1720        
1721        Args:
1722            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv to be saved.
1723            filename_reference (str): Filename of target image. Can be produced with os.path.basename(fullpath. Example: "image.jpg".
1724            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format: [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1725            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename(s) of moving image(s).
1726            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image.
1727        """
1728        # Check if all inputs exist
1729        if filename_reference is None:
1730            return 
1731        elif points_reference is None:
1732            return
1733        elif filename_toregister is None:
1734            return
1735        elif points_toregister is None:
1736            return
1737        elif len(points_reference) != len(points_toregister):
1738            return
1739        
1740        x_reference = []
1741        y_reference = []
1742        x_toregister = []
1743        y_toregister = []
1744        
1745        header = [["Butterfly Registrator"],
1746                  [__version__],
1747                  ["control points"],
1748                  ["Assumes moving image(s) resized and padded to match target image dimensions"],
1749                  ["target"],
1750                  [filename_reference],
1751                  ["moving"],
1752                  filename_toregister,
1753                  ["x", "y", "x", "y"]]
1754        
1755        for point_reference, point_toregister in zip(points_reference, points_toregister):
1756            x_reference.append(point_reference[0])
1757            y_reference.append(point_reference[1])
1758            x_toregister.append(point_toregister[0])
1759            y_toregister.append(point_toregister[1])
1760
1761
1762        with open(fullpath, "w", newline='') as csv_file:
1763            csv_writer = csv.writer(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1764            for row in header:
1765                csv_writer.writerow(row)
1766            for row in zip(x_reference, y_reference, x_toregister, y_toregister):
1767                csv_writer.writerow(row)
1768
1769    def read_resize_pad_register(self, filename):
1770        """Read, resize, and register an image file with the last applied homography.
1771        
1772        Args:
1773            filename (str): The absolute filepath to the image.
1774            
1775        Returns:
1776            image_registered (cvImage, bool): Registered image if successful; False if dimensions do not match those of base moving image."""
1777
1778        points_source = self.points_toregister
1779        points_destination = self.points_reference
1780
1781        filename_toregister = filename
1782
1783        # Load image to be registered
1784        if filename_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1785            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1786            if image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1787                image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister) 
1788        else:
1789            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister)
1790        image_toregister = image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1791        image_toregister_dims = image_toregister.shape
1792        image_toregister_height = image_toregister_dims[0]
1793        image_toregister_width = image_toregister_dims[1]
1794
1795        if (image_toregister_height != self.image_toregister_height) or (image_toregister_width != self.image_toregister_width):
1796            return False
1797
1798        # Resize
1799        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1800        aspect_toregister = image_toregister_width/image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1801
1802        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1803            image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1804            image_toregister_resize_height = int(image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1805        else: # If the toregister narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1806            image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1807            image_toregister_resize_width = int(image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1808            
1809        image_toregister_resize_dims = (image_toregister_resize_width, image_toregister_resize_height)
1810        image_toregister_resize = resize(image_toregister, image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1811
1812        # Pad
1813        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1814        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1815        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - image_toregister_resize_height
1816        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - image_toregister_resize_width
1817        if image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1818            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1819        else:
1820            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1821
1822        image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1823        image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1824
1825        image = image_toregister_resize
1826        width = image_toregister_resize_width
1827        height = image_toregister_resize_height
1828        size = (width, height)
1829
1830        transform = getPerspectiveTransform(points_source, points_destination)
1831
1832        image_registered = warpPerspective(image, transform, size)
1833
1834        return image_registered
1835

Interface to register a moving image to a target image by setting control points in viewers of each.

Instantiate without input.

Registration is based on four-point perspective transformation where the control points are manually dragged.

Interface sequence: Load the target image by drag-and-drop or open dialog. Load the moving image by drag-and-drop or open dialog. Set the control points on each image by click-and-drag. Preview the registered image and compare with the target image in a split-view. Adjust and re-compare the control points, if needed. Save the registered image. (Optional) Batch-register multiple images with the current registration, if needed.

def on_registration_point_emitted_reference(self, pos_on_scene, index): 
817    def on_registration_point_emitted_reference(self, pos_on_scene, index):
818        """Update the displayed coordinates of a given target control point.
819        
820        Triggered when a control point is moved on the reference image.
821        
822        Args:
823            pos_on_scene (QPointF): The position on the scene of the control point.
824            index (int): The index of the control point (which control point it is).
825        """
826        x = pos_on_scene.x()
827        y = pos_on_scene.y()
828        i = index + 1
829
830        x_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(x)
831        y_str = '{0:0.2f}'.format(y)
832
833        if i is 1:
834            self.reference_point_label_x1.setText(x_str)
835            self.reference_point_label_x1.value = x
836            self.reference_point_label_y1.setText(y_str)
837            self.reference_point_label_y1.value = y
838        elif i is 2:
839            self.reference_point_label_x2.setText(x_str)
840            self.reference_point_label_x2.value = x
841            self.reference_point_label_y2.setText(y_str)
842            self.reference_point_label_y2.value = y
843        elif i is 3:
844            self.reference_point_label_x3.setText(x_str)
845            self.reference_point_label_x3.value = x
846            self.reference_point_label_y3.setText(y_str)
847            self.reference_point_label_y3.value = y
848        elif i is 4:
849            self.reference_point_label_x4.setText(x_str)
850            self.reference_point_label_x4.value = x
851            self.reference_point_label_y4.setText(y_str)
852            self.reference_point_label_y4.value = y
853
854        self.points_reference[i-1][0] = x
855        self.points_reference[i-1][1] = y

905        """Load an image as the target image.
906        
907        Args:
908            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the reference image.
909            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
910            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.

 983

def load_toregister( self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None): 
1033    def load_toregister(self, filename_main_topleft, filename_topright=None, filename_bottomleft=None, filename_bottomright=None):
1034        """Load an image as the moving image.
1035
1036        Resizes and pads the moving image to match the dimensions of the target image.
1037        
1038        Args:
1039            filename_main_topleft (str): The image filepath for the to-be-registered image.
1040            filename_topright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1041            filename_bottomleft (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1042            filename_bottomright (str): Unused. Keep as None.
1043        """
1044        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Loading image to be registered...")
1045
1046        self.fullpath_toregister = filename_main_topleft
1047
1048        # Load image
1049        if self.fullpath_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1050            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1051            if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1052                self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister) 
1053        else:
1054            self.image_toregister = imread(self.fullpath_toregister)
1055        self.image_toregister = self.image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1056        self.image_toregister_dims = self.image_toregister.shape
1057        self.image_toregister_height = self.image_toregister_dims[0]
1058        self.image_toregister_width = self.image_toregister_dims[1]
1059
1060        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1061        aspect_toregister = self.image_toregister_width/self.image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1062
1063        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1064            self.image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1065            self.image_toregister_resize_height = int(self.image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1066        else: # If the toregister is narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1067            self.image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1068            self.image_toregister_resize_width = int(self.image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1069            
1070        self.image_toregister_resize_dims = (self.image_toregister_resize_width, self.image_toregister_resize_height)
1071        self.image_toregister_resize = resize(self.image_toregister, self.image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1072
1073        # Pad
1074        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1075        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1076        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - self.image_toregister_resize_height
1077        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - self.image_toregister_resize_width
1078        if self.image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1079            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1080        else:
1081            self.image_toregister_resize = np.pad(self.image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1082
1083        self.image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1084        self.image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1085
1086        # Convert cvImage to QPixmap
1087        height, width, channels = self.image_toregister_resize.shape
1088        
1089        total_bytes = self.image_toregister_resize.nbytes
1090        bytes_per_line = int(total_bytes/height)
1091        # bytes_per_line = width*3
1092        if channels is 4:
1093            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGBA8888).rgbSwapped()
1094        else:
1095            qimage = QtGui.QImage(self.image_toregister_resize.data, width, height, bytes_per_line, QtGui.QImage.Format_RGB888).rgbSwapped()
1096
1097        self.pixmap_toregister_resize = QtGui.QPixmap(qimage)
1098        pixmap_topright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_topright)
1099        pixmap_bottomleft = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomleft)
1100        pixmap_bottomright = QtGui.QPixmap(filename_bottomright)
1101
1102        self.viewer_toregister = self.create_viewer_toregister(self.pixmap_toregister_resize, self.fullpath_toregister, pixmap_topright, pixmap_bottomleft, pixmap_bottomright)
1103        self.toregister_layout.addWidget(self.viewer_toregister, 1, 0)
1104        
1105        self.viewer_toregister.zoomFactor = self.viewer_reference.zoomFactor
1106        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.centerView)
1107        QtCore.QTimer.singleShot(50, self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points)
1108        
1109        self.viewer_toregister.registration_point_emitted.connect(self.on_registration_point_emitted_toregister)
1110
1111        self.set_enabled_result(True)
1112        self.result_apply_button.setEnabled(True)
1113        self.result_batch_widget.setEnabled(True)
1114
1115        self.viewer_toregister_isclosed = False
1116
1117        self.viewer_reference.emit_registration_points()
1118        self.viewer_toregister.emit_registration_points()
1119
1120        # Line edits
1121        self.toregister_point_label_x1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1122        self.toregister_point_label_y1.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1123        self.toregister_point_label_x2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1124        self.toregister_point_label_y2.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1125        self.toregister_point_label_x3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1126        self.toregister_point_label_y3.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1127        self.toregister_point_label_x4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1128        self.toregister_point_label_y4.changed_value.connect(self.viewer_toregister.set_point)
1129
1130        self.display_loading_grayout(False)

def save_batch(self): 
1436    def save_batch(self):
1437        """Register and save the selected batch files to the selected destination folder."""
1438        self.display_loading_grayout(True, "Registering and saving batch image(s)...")
1439
1440        one_or_more_images_mismatch = False
1441
1442        fullpaths = self.filepaths_batch
1443        folderpath = self.folderpath_batch
1444
1445        one_or_more_already_exists = False
1446
1447        for fullpath in fullpaths:
1448            fullpath_intended = self.generate_registered_fullpath(folderpath, fullpath)[0]
1449            if os.path.isfile(fullpath_intended):
1450                one_or_more_already_exists = True
1451
1452        if one_or_more_already_exists:
1453            box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1454            title = "Overwrite already registered files?"
1455            text = "One or more of the images you selected already exist as registered images in the selected destination folder."
1456            box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1457            box.addButton("Overwrite and proceed", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1458            box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1459            response = box.exec_()
1460
1461            if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1462                self.display_loading_grayout(False)
1463                return
1464

def load_points( self, fullpath: str = None, filename_reference: str = None, filename_toregister: str = None): 
1624    def load_points(self,
1625                    fullpath: str=None,
1626                    filename_reference: str=None,
1627                    filename_toregister: str=None):
1628        """Get control points from .csv to target and moving images.
1629
1630        Checks whether current target image and moving image are those in the .csv file.
1631
1632        Args:
1633            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv of control points to be loaded.
1634            filename_reference (str): Filename of current target image.
1635            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename of current moving image.
1636
1637        Returns:
1638            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1639            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image in format [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1640        """
1641        
1642        points_reference = []
1643        points_toregister = []
1644
1645        if fullpath:
1646
1647            with open(fullpath, "r", newline='') as csv_file:
1648                csv_reader = csv.reader(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1649                csv_list = list(csv_reader)
1650
1651            i = None
1652
1653            try:
1654                i = csv_list.index(["target"])
1655            except ValueError:
1656                box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1657                title = "Invalid .csv control point file"
1658                text = "The selected .csv control point file does not have a format accepted by this app."
1659                box_buttons = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Close
1660                box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text, box_buttons)
1661                box.exec_()
1662            else:
1663                skip_reference = False
1664                skip_toregister = False
1665
1666                i += 1 # Move to target filename
1667                if not csv_list[i][0] == filename_reference:
1668                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1669                    title = "Filename mismatch target image"
1670                    text = "The filename of the reference image (the target image) does not match the target filename in the control point file."
1671                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1672                    box.addButton("Load reference points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1673                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1674                    response = box.exec_()
1675                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1676                        skip_reference = True
1677
1678                i += 2 # Move to moving filename
1679                try:
1680                    csv_list[i].index(filename_toregister)
1681                except ValueError:
1682                    box_type = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning
1683                    title = "Filename mismatch moving image"
1684                    text = "The filename of the to-be-registered image (the moving image) does not match any moving filenames in the control point file."
1685                    box = QtWidgets.QMessageBox(box_type, title, text)
1686                    box.addButton("Load moving points anyway", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole)
1687                    box.addButton("Cancel", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.RejectRole)
1688                    response = box.exec_()
1689                    if response != QtWidgets.QMessageBox.AcceptRole:
1690                        skip_toregister = True
1691
1692                i += 2 # Move to XY pairs
1693                point = -1
1694                for row in csv_list[i:]:
1695                    point += 1
1696                    if not skip_reference:
1697                        points_reference.append([float(row[0]), float(row[1])])
1698                        if not skip_toregister:
1699                            points_toregister.append([float(row[2]), float(row[3])])
1700
1701        return points_reference, points_toregister

def save_points( self, fullpath: str = None, filename_reference: str = None, points_reference: list = None, filename_toregister: list = None, points_toregister: list = None): 
1715    def save_points(self, 
1716                    fullpath: str=None,
1717                    filename_reference: str=None, points_reference: list=None, 
1718                    filename_toregister: list=None, points_toregister: list=None):
1719        """Save the control points of the target image and moving image to a .csv with a given filepath.
1720        
1721        Args:
1722            fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv to be saved.
1723            filename_reference (str): Filename of target image. Can be produced with os.path.basename(fullpath. Example: "image.jpg".
1724            points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format: [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
1725            filename_toregister (list of str): Filename(s) of moving image(s).
1726            points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image.
1727        """
1728        # Check if all inputs exist
1729        if filename_reference is None:
1730            return 
1731        elif points_reference is None:
1732            return
1733        elif filename_toregister is None:
1734            return
1735        elif points_toregister is None:
1736            return
1737        elif len(points_reference) != len(points_toregister):
1738            return
1739        
1740        x_reference = []
1741        y_reference = []
1742        x_toregister = []
1743        y_toregister = []
1744        
1745        header = [["Butterfly Registrator"],
1746                  [__version__],
1747                  ["control points"],
1748                  ["Assumes moving image(s) resized and padded to match target image dimensions"],
1749                  ["target"],
1750                  [filename_reference],
1751                  ["moving"],
1752                  filename_toregister,
1753                  ["x", "y", "x", "y"]]
1754        
1755        for point_reference, point_toregister in zip(points_reference, points_toregister):
1756            x_reference.append(point_reference[0])
1757            y_reference.append(point_reference[1])
1758            x_toregister.append(point_toregister[0])
1759            y_toregister.append(point_toregister[1])
1760
1761

1763            csv_writer = csv.writer(csv_file, delimiter="|")
1764            for row in header:
1765                csv_writer.writerow(row)
1766            for row in zip(x_reference, y_reference, x_toregister, y_toregister):
1767                csv_writer.writerow(row)

Save the control points of the target image and moving image to a .csv with a given filepath.

Arguments:
  • fullpath (str): Absolute path of .csv to be saved.
  • filename_reference (str): Filename of target image. Can be produced with os.path.basename(fullpath. Example: "image.jpg".
  • points_reference (list): Control points of target image in format: [ [X1, Y1], [X2, Y2], ... ]
  • filename_toregister (list of str): Filename(s) of moving image(s).
  • points_toregister (list): Control points of moving image.
def read_resize_pad_register(self, filename): 
1769    def read_resize_pad_register(self, filename):
1770        """Read, resize, and register an image file with the last applied homography.
1771        
1772        Args:
1773            filename (str): The absolute filepath to the image.
1774            
1775        Returns:
1776            image_registered (cvImage, bool): Registered image if successful; False if dimensions do not match those of base moving image."""
1777
1778        points_source = self.points_toregister
1779        points_destination = self.points_reference
1780
1781        filename_toregister = filename
1782
1783        # Load image to be registered
1784        if filename_toregister.endswith(".png"): # Preserve the alpha channel if a PNG.
1785            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister, IMREAD_UNCHANGED)
1786            if image_toregister.ndim is 2: # ...but if the PNG is monochannel, redo the imread and let cv2 determine how.
1787                image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister) 
1788        else:
1789            image_toregister = imread(filename_toregister)
1790        image_toregister = image_toregister.astype('uint8')
1791        image_toregister_dims = image_toregister.shape
1792        image_toregister_height = image_toregister_dims[0]
1793        image_toregister_width = image_toregister_dims[1]
1794
1795        if (image_toregister_height != self.image_toregister_height) or (image_toregister_width != self.image_toregister_width):
1796            return False
1797
1798        # Resize
1799        aspect_reference = self.image_reference_width/self.image_reference_height # W/H (e.g., 4:3)
1800        aspect_toregister = image_toregister_width/image_toregister_height # w/h (e.g., 16:9)
1801
1802        if aspect_toregister > aspect_reference: # If the toregister is wider than the reference, resize toregister to match widths
1803            image_toregister_resize_width = self.image_reference_width
1804            image_toregister_resize_height = int(image_toregister_resize_width/aspect_toregister)
1805        else: # If the toregister narrower or equi-aspect to the reference, resize toregister to match heights
1806            image_toregister_resize_height = self.image_reference_height
1807            image_toregister_resize_width = int(image_toregister_resize_height*aspect_toregister)
1808            
1809        image_toregister_resize_dims = (image_toregister_resize_width, image_toregister_resize_height)
1810        image_toregister_resize = resize(image_toregister, image_toregister_resize_dims, interpolation = INTER_AREA)
1811
1812        # Pad
1813        # If the toregister is shorter in aspect than the reference, pad the height [rows] to match heights
1814        # If the toregister is narrower in aspect than the reference, pad the width [columns] to match widths
1815        add_rows = self.image_reference_height - image_toregister_resize_height
1816        add_cols = self.image_reference_width - image_toregister_resize_width
1817        if image_toregister.ndim is 2:
1818            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols)), 'constant')
1819        else:
1820            image_toregister_resize = np.pad(image_toregister_resize, ((0,add_rows), (0,add_cols), (0,0)), 'constant')
1821
1822        image_toregister_resize_width += add_cols
1823        image_toregister_resize_height += add_rows
1824
1825        image = image_toregister_resize
1826        width = image_toregister_resize_width
1827        height = image_toregister_resize_height
1828        size = (width, height)
1829
1830        transform = getPerspectiveTransform(points_source, points_destination)
1831
1832        image_registered = warpPerspective(image, transform, size)
1833
1834        return image_registered

Read, resize, and register an image file with the last applied homography.

Arguments:
  • filename (str): The absolute filepath to the image.
Returns:
  • image_registered (cvImage, bool): Registered image if successful; False if dimensions do not match those of base moving image.

1983    def readSettings(self):
1984        """Read application settings."""
1985        settings = QtCore.QSettings()
1986
1987        pos = settings.value('pos', QtCore.QPoint(100, 100))
1988        size = settings.value('size', QtCore.QSize(1100, 600))
1989        self.move(pos)
1990        self.resize(size)
1991
1992        if settings.contains('windowgeometry'):
1993            self.restoreGeometry(settings.value('windowgeometry'))
1994        if settings.contains('windowstate'):
1995            self.restoreState(settings.value('windowstate'))
1996
1997    def writeSettings(self):
1998        """Write application settings."""
1999        settings = QtCore.QSettings()
2000        settings.setValue('pos', self.pos())
2001        settings.setValue('size', self.size())
2002        settings.setValue('windowgeometry', self.saveGeometry())
2003        settings.setValue('windowstate', self.saveState())
2004
2005    def closeEvent(self, event):
2006        """QEvent: Override close event to save application settings."""
2007        self.writeSettings()
2008        event.accept()
2009

2011        """bool: For enabling/disabling interface when loading (True=disable; False=enable)."""
2012        self.setEnabled(not boolean)
